skill.name: Moon Arrow
skill.des: Miya shoots two extra arrows on each Basic Attack, dealing 10<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the target enemy and 30% damage to the rest. This effect lasts 4s. Each arrow inherits a portion of Attack Effects.
skill.tips: This is Miya’s core late-game damage skill. After using it, Miya’s basic attacks will deal damage to three targets. This skill can help Miya to deal heavy AoE damage in team fights. This skill benefits greatly from physical attack obtained through items, so you should only upgrade it to level 1 in the early game, until you get some gear.

skill.name: Arrow of Eclipse
skill.des: Miya launches an empowered arrow on the target area, dealing 90<font color='#D58E1F'>( +45% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s. The arrow then splits into 8 scattering minor arrows, each dealing 30<font color='#D58E1F'>( +15% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s.
skill.tips: This circular slowing skill has a large range, and after hitting an enemy four times, the target will be frozen. Combine this with other teammates’ control skills to leave your enemy feeling hopeless. This is Miya’s main damage and wave-clearing skill in the early game, and is therefore a priority when upgrading skills.

skill.name: Hidden Moonlight
skill.des:
Miya removes all debuffs on her and conceals herself, gaining 35% extra Movement Speed. This state lasts 2s or until she launches an attack.
Miya gains full stacks of <font color='#404495'>(Moon Blessing)</font> upon leaving the state.
skill.tips: This displacement skill removes all control effects from Miya and puts her into stealth, significantly enhancing her survivability in team fights. When the enemy team suddenly launches an attack in the late game, Miya can retreat and find a safer position to attack from.

skill.name: Moon Blessing
skill.des:
Each time Miya hits a target with her Basic Attack, her Attack Speed increases by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.
After reaching full stacks, Miya summons a <font color='#404495'>(Moonlight Shadow)</font> with each Basic Attack that deals 30<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and inherits a portion of Attack Effects.
skill.tips: Miya’s basic attacks increase her attack speed, so her damage will increase the longer she stays in combat. Before engaging a hero, try to build up and maintain your passive attack speed boost by continually attacking minions.

item.tips:
Prioritize her second skill, then first, and upgrade her ultimate whenever you can.
Miya’s second skill can help her to effectively push the lane and trade with enemy laners.

equip.name: Corrosion Scythe
des: Unique Passive - Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equip.name: Demon Hunter Sword
des: Unique Passive - Devour: Basic Attacks deal 9% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).

equip.name: Golden Staff
des: Unique Passive - Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.

equip.name: Haas' Claws
des: Unique Passive - Insanity: Gains 15% extra Physical Lifesteal when below 50% HP.

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

gear.tips: Miya’s skills grant her a lot of attack speed, so Swift Boots are not really needed. Choosing Rapid Boots can help Miya to achieve better positioning in team fights.

besty.best_mate_tips: Miya is very fragile and requires the protection of her teammates to reach her full damage potential. Lolita can help her to achieve this.
besty.name: Lolita

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Miya’s damage is very high, so tanks who lack high damage will find it difficult to deal with her in the late game.
counter.name: Hylos

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Miya is very squishy, and without the aid of support heroes, is susceptible to assassins.
countered_by.name: Hayabusa

skill.name: Soul Lock
skill.des: Balmond charges in the target direction for a set distance or until he hits an enemy hero, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way. The enemy hero hit will be knocked back slightly and slowed by 30% for 2s.
skill.tips: This skill for u RUN or Open WAR. on early game balmond easy for run out on enemy gank u. when Open WAR, always try to charge to enemy's mage Heroes 1st.

skill.name: Cyclone Sweep
skill.des: Balmond spins with his axe for 3s, continuously dealing 50<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies. Enemies hit multiple times will take increased damage (25% extra damage per extra hit, up to 100%). The part of damage affected by Physical Attack can critically strike.
skill.tips: The most easy for use is this skill. after u use jz walk around or follow enemy move. remember after u on this skill, u unable to use ur Skill 1 or SKill 3 (u still can use ur Battle Spell). but after u on this skill, after delay a second, u also can use again this skill for disable, so now u can use other Skill.

skill.name: Lethal Counter
skill.des: After a short delay, Balmond smashes his axe in the target direction, dealing 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 20% of the target's lost HP as <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and slowing them by 40% for 2s. This skill deals up to 1000 damage to non-hero enemies.
skill.tips: This Ultimate skill has a Powerful damage to enemy, BUT the weakness is, pls dont try to use on when enemy is full HP. try to use on when got any enemy HP is below 1/4, if enemy not yet dead in this Skill, but still can slow down enemy's Movement Speed. on early game, u can use for kill turtle when turtle HP is below 1/3, try to help teamate kill turtle or u can go steal turtle when enemy fighting on there. BEST for steal Lord, when enemy fighting with Lord, Balmond is the BEST for stealing. when Lord HP is under 1/3.

skill.name: Bloodthirst
skill.des: Balmond recovers 5% Max HP on minion or creep kills, and 20% on hero kills.
skill.tips: On fighter build pls always remember ur passive skill. try to near enemy minions for fight/war on early game.

item.tips: level 1 dont up S1, coz if enemy is play 3 heroes on your lane, u still can use S2 for def. S2 also can help your teamate get the 1st buff.

equip.name: Cursed Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: Deals Magic Damage equal to 0.8% of the hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 210% to 350% against creeps and minions (scales with level).

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Queen's Wings
des: Unique Passive - Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 20% Damage Reduction and 35% extra Spell Vamp for 5s (60s cooldown).

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

gear.tips:
1. Cursed Helmet: this item is very good for him. faster killing creeps, and jz walk around enemy, also take damage to them.
2. Boost: jz depend on ur enemy heroes. if enemy team got 3 or more mage, buy + magic def. if enemy heroes have MM or Assassin, buy + armor.
3. BLoodlust Axe: + ATK, reg HP when your skills hit on enemy. also has CDR 10%. on late game, when any enemy have anti-heal item, pls sell this item(Bloodlust Axe), and but some DEF or ATK item.

besty.best_mate_tips: Can hold enemy RUN away
besty.name: Nana

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Use Balmond S1 can easy drop all Gord Skills
counter.name: Gord

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: S1 and Ulti can stop Balmond S2
countered_by.name: Chou

skill.name: Orbiting Swords
skill.des:
Saber releases 5 swords that orbit around him and deal 80<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies on hit. The swords will retract back to him after a while.
When the swords are present, Saber sends a sword toward his target on each attack, dealing 210<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> extra <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the target and 50% of the damage to other enemies it passes through (damage against minions is reduced to 50%). Each attack also reduces the cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Charge)</font> by 1s .
skill.tips: When standing together with the enemy, using flying sword will deal damage 4 times. You may control the range for long distance poking.

skill.name: Charge
skill.des: Saber dashes in the target direction, dealing 75<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way while enhancing his next Basic Attack. The enhanced Basic Attack deals 75<font color='#D58E1F'>( +120% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slows the target by 60% for 1s.
skill.tips: Initiate with Triple Sweep, leave Charge as a escape, at critical moments use Charge to go through walls

skill.name: Triple Sweep
skill.des: Saber charges at the target enemy hero, knocking them airborne for 1.2s and striking them 3 times over the duration. The first two strikes deal 120<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> each, while the third strike deals 240<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: 1. Target low health or squishy enemies, when Triple Sweep is about to end hold down the direction, this will cause you to move forward a step upon landing, then deal 4 times damage with Flying Sword.                                   2. When being tower dived by the enemy,use Triple Sweep on the enemy that is being attacked by the turret, knocking them up for extra tower hits.

skill.name: Enemy's Bane
skill.des: Saber's attacks reduce enemies' Physical Defense by 3-8 for 5s on hit (up to 5 stacks).
skill.tips: Use Flying Sword to poke enemies as well as to apply passive stacks

item.tips:
Max 1, then 2. Level up ultimate when possible.
Retribution - Use it to scale within the jungle. On initial buy get Hunter's Knife, rush for Nimble Blade for more efficient jungling, but no need to upgrade it to Raptor's Machete. During the late game, sell it and buy something else. Roam lots, use your ultimate to initiate, cooperate with your teammates in bursting down enemies.up.

equip.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
des: Unique Passive - Ambush: If no damage is dealt to or taken from enemy heroes within 5s, the next Basic Attack deals 160 plus 40% Physical Attack as extra Physical Damage and slows the target by 40% for 1.5s.

equip.name: Ice Hunter's Magic Shoes
des: Unique Passive - Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal <2|lv 2> + <1005 0.02> True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Hunter Strike
des: Unique Passive - Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips: Burst Damage Equipment Set. Haas's Claw for sustain capabilities, Blade of Depair's passive can increase ultimate's damage by 10%. Blade of the 7 Seas, Deadly Blade can complement Saber's passive, potentially able to reduce an opponent's armor by 100, if the enemy has no armor items, they will have 0 armor defence. Lastly get magic blade for survivability, if you have a big lead you can exchange it for Malefic Roar, giving you another item that helps with ignoring armor. During team fights, do not be the initiator, wait for a chance to strie at the back line or wait it out to finish off dying enemies.

besty.best_mate_tips: Saber’s control skill can help Harley to achieve maximum damage output. Their excellent mobility can generate great momentum in the early game.
besty.name: Harley

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Layla, Odette -- Heroes without displacement skills are very vulnerable to Saber’s sudden charge.
counter.name: Odette

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Diggie’s ultimate skill can cancel the control effect of Saber’s control skill.
countered_by.name: Diggie

skill.name: Flowing Blood
skill.des:
Alice casts a sphere of blood energy in the target direction, dealing 400<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path. 
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Alice immediately teleports to the blood sphere's location.
skill.tips: Alice fires a blood orb in the specified direction, dealing  points of Magic Damage to enemies. Using this skill again to immediately teleport to the orb's location.

skill.name: Blood Awe
skill.des: Alice deals 270<font color='#27C0C7'>( +90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies, immobilizing them for 1.2s and slowing them by 70% for 0.8s afterward.
skill.tips: Alice deals points of Magic Damage to nearby enemies, immobilizing them for 1.2 seconds, then the enemies will be slowed for 2 seconds.

skill.name: Blood Ode
skill.des: Alice enters the blood-draining state, consuming 50 Mana while dealing 90<font color='#27C0C7'>( +20% Total Magic Power)</font> + 0.5<font color='#27C0C7'>( <1015 0.0005 1>)</font>% of target's Max HP as <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies every 0.5s. She also recovers 60<font color='#27C0C7'>( +10% Total Magic Power)</font> HP each time she damages an enemy (50% of this amount for non-hero enemies). The blood-draining state lasts until Alice runs out of Mana or the skill is cast again.
skill.tips: Queen of the Apocalypse enters the blood-sucking state for the next 5 seconds, dealing  points of Magic Damage to surrounding enemies every 0.5 seconds while restoring  HP for herself.

skill.name: Blood Ancestry
skill.des: A blood orb will be generated each time an enemy minion dies near Alice, or two orbs when an enemy hero dies. She can absorb the orbs to permanently increase 10 Max HP and 20 Max Mana. After absorbing 12/25/50 blood orbs, Alice gains 1.5%/s Mana Regen/15% Shield and HP Regen/40 extra Movement Speed, respectively.
skill.tips: When a nearby minion dies, a blood orb is generated. Each blood orb absorbed permanently increases Alice's max HP . After absorbing  blood orbs, she will receive an additional upgrade of  Cooldown Reduction/ Spell Vamp/ movement speed.

item.tips:
Max Skill 1 terlebih dahulu.
Purify adalah Spell yang terbaik untuk Alice sebagai Engager, Purify juga dapat membantu Alice melarikan diri dari lawan.
Petrify juga Spell yang sangat bagus untuk Alice untuk memaksimalkan kemampuan Crowd Control dari Skill kedua Alice.

equip.name: Clock of Destiny
des: Unique Passive - Time: Gains 20 extra Max HP and 4 extra Magic Power every 20s, capped at 15 stacks.

equip.name: Demon Shoes
des: Unique Passive - Mysticism: Recovers 10% Max Mana on hero kills or assists and 4% on minion kills.

equip.name: Ice Queen Wand
des: Unique Passive - Ice Bound: Skills slow the target by 15% for 3s, capped at 2 stacks.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Glowing Wand
des: Unique Passive - Scorch: Magic Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP per second, and increasing their Magic Damage taken by 2-4 (scales with level). Stacks up to 6 times.

gear.tips: Set Build ini adalah salah satu Build terbaik untuk Alice yang membutuhkan HP. Dengan jumlah HP nya yang banyak, Alice dapat bertahan lebih lama ketika melakukan Engage atau memasuki Team Fight.

besty.best_mate_tips: Aurora's freeze and Alice's ultimate are excellent combination. Not only that, Aurora's freeze could also help Alice to engage with the enemies.
besty.name: Aurora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: It's difficult for heroes without mobility such as Layla to run away from Alice.
counter.name: Layla

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Hero with strong CC such as Nana, Eudore and Aurora could make it difficult for Alice to contribute for her team.kontribusi terhadap timnya.
countered_by.name: Nana

skill.name: Magic Boomerang
skill.des: Nana hurls her Magic Boomerang in the target direction, dealing 245<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies hit on its way out and back. This damage is reduced by 20% for each extra enemy hit (up to 60%).
skill.tips: Your long range poking skill.This skill will be your main damaging skill in laning phase, try to aim and hit all targets.

skill.name: Molina Smooch
skill.des:
Nana sends Molina to the target location, who will then seek and chase the nearest enemy hero in the area and transform the first enemy hero it collides with for 1.5s. Molina also deals 250<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the transformed enemy, slows them by 50%, and reduces their Magic Defense by 25% for the duration.
Molina will remain stationary for up to 12s if there are no enemy heroes in the area and can chase an enemy hero for up to 2.5s before it disappears.
skill.tips: Your main harassing kit.One of the longest disable. However you’ll need a teammate to deal enough damage to kill someone.

skill.name: Molina Blitz
skill.des: Nana summons Molina to attack the target area 3 times, each time dealing 400<font color='#27C0C7'>( +180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies within and slowing them by 50% for 1s. Enemies hit twice will be stunned for 1s.
skill.tips: Try to pop this during a teamfight to disable as many enemies as possible.Practice makes perfect, get down the timing of your ult and try to match you “2” with your “3” to increase the chances of it hitting.

skill.name: Molina's Gift
skill.des:
Upon taking fatal damage, Nana removes all debuffs on her and transforms, becoming untargetable and invincible and gaining 70% extra Movement Speed for 2s. She also recovers 10% Max HP over the duration.
Nana can only transform once every 150s and cannot cast skills in the transformed form.
skill.tips: If you guys follow the 1-1-3/3-1-1 Lane formation, Nana would fit in the lane with 3 people, to maximise the gold drop.

item.tips:
Max “2” first, for more sustain damage.
Flicker a little bit more useful on Nana, as you’ll need to escape if you get caught somehow, since you don’t exactly have a running skill.

equip.name: Enchanted Talisman
des: Unique Passive - Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.

equip.name: Genius Wand
des: Unique Passive - Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3-7 (scales with level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Divine Glaive
des: Unique Passive - Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

gear.tips: Item 1 ~ 3 will be your core item, while item 4 ~ 6 are all swappable, if you like to have more AP, opt for higher AP items like BloodWings, or Holy Crystal, if you find that you don’t require much AP but more debuffs go for the Truncheons.

besty.best_mate_tips: Mages like Aurora, Due to her High damage kit, pairing her up with Nana would allow her to easily land her skills and making those 2 a pretty annoying combo to lane against.
besty.name: Aurora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: With so many Fanny roaming around, your “2” would come in handy in disabling her
counter.name: Fanny

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: The Silence and her damage could shred you before you can even do anything.
countered_by.name: Natalia

skill.name: Attack Wave
skill.des: Tigreal sends a shockwave in the target direction, dealing 270<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and slowing them by up to 30% for 1.5s. The slow effect scales with the shockwave's travel distance.
skill.tips: A Straight wave that is useful for killing minions, slowing down running enemies from battles and useful to stop enemies' HP regen. Try not to spam it a lot because it consumes a lot of mana, just waste it while having enemies in front and you make sure that you will hit them.

skill.name: Sacred Hammer
skill.des:
Tigreal charges in the target direction, dealing <font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in his path and sweeping them along with him.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Tigreal can cast this skill again within 4s, dealing 280<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in front and knocking them airborne for 1s.
skill.tips: The most important Tigreal's ability, being hard to master at the begining but easier to manipulate after playing several games with Tigreal. This ability complements well with the battle spell Flicker by dragging the enemy team to your side where your team awaits for them. Anyway, it costs even more mana than the 1st ability so use it wisely.

skill.name: Implosion
skill.des: Tigreal pulls nearby enemies to him, then smashes the ground with his hammer, dealing 270<font color='#D58E1F'>( +130% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the area and stunning them for 1.5s.
skill.tips: The perfect complement for the 2nd ability and flicker. It is one of the best crowd control abilities on the game, so you have a great power in your hands and a really useful weapon for teamfights.

skill.name: Fearless
skill.des: Tigreal gains a stack of blessing each time he casts a skill or is hit by a Basic Attack (excluding attacks from minions). At 4 stacks, Tigreal will consume all the stacks to negate the damage of the next Basic Attack he receives (excluding attacks from minions).
skill.tips: Remember to do basic attacks between spells to harden you even more. You don't need to hit enemies to activate your passive so do it before Teamfights, or when you considerate it is necessary.

item.tips:
You should max his 2nd ability to reduce its cooldown and mana consume, it is important to max that ability due to the movility it provides you when you are far from a battle and want to go and helpm, also because it is the most useful Tigreal skill after his Ultimate. Anyway, you should start picking the first ability for a faster cleaning of your line in early game and to spam it to your oponents. (Max Ultimate whenever is possible)
Flicker - It is obligatory to always pick Flicker, and the reason is really simple; it is the best spell that you can use to combine Tigreal skills as mentioned above.

equip.name: Athena's Shield
des: Unique Passive - Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, gains 25% Magic Damage Reduction for 3s (applied before taking damage). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

equip.name: Warrior Boots - Conceal
des: Active Skill - Conceal: Success

equip.name: Antique Cuirass
des: Unique Passive - Deter: When struck by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s, capped at 3 stacks.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

equip.name: Cursed Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: Deals Magic Damage equal to 0.8% of the hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 210% to 350% against creeps and minions (scales with level).

gear.tips:
1) Inmortality: You have a chance to resurrect and enemies would take their distance because they would know that killing you is not a wise decision, they will respect you and won't mess with you so often. A good advantage for early game.
2) Warrior Boots: After the inmortality, you will need movility, and the best option is to buy warrior boots because that item is the only one that gives you armor and movility together.
3) Cursed Helmet: If you have a lot of CC, and you would be close to the enemy so often, a great gear to buy is the cursed helmet. It has saved me a lot of times from enemies chasing me, I just stun them and let the gear do its job. It is also useful for a faster line minion cleaning.
4) Courage Bulwark: The objective of being a Tank is to do Teamwork. This item is the best item for teamwork, it gives attack power and defense to allies around you. It also let your allies to take more damage from turrets by hardening them.
5) Bloodthirsty King: The item that gives you the biggest ammount of Hp, it is a good combination with the cursed helmet. The main work this item does is to regen your hp 20% for each kill or assist (and you will have a lot of assistances).
6) Heart of Steel: Needed for late game. It reduces the % of Crit when enemies hit you, making you even more harder.

besty.best_mate_tips: Tigreal put all the enemies together with his skill combination and gord with his stun and ultimate kills them all while Tigreal has all of them stunned. The most of the times my friend gets Triple Kill/Maniac and even once he reached Savage by doing this combo. A nice team.
besty.name: Gord

counter.restrain_hero_tips: The only mobility Miya has is her Ultimate, and it has a big cooldown, making Tigreal able to reach her while escaping by using Flicker and 2nd ability, and even only his 2nd would be enough.
counter.name: Miya

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: It is obvious why she is here, she has a stun that lasts enough to let the enemy team lower your hp faster if you don't take care, Tigreal is pretty hard, but not inmortal like Argus with his Ulti. Keep an eye on it.
countered_by.name: Eudora

skill.name: Groundsplitter
skill.des: Alucard rolls to the target location and slams his blade on the ground, dealing 270<font color='#D58E1F'>( +110% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 2s.
skill.tips:
Escape tool, you can use this to jump over the wall
Engage tool, you can use this to get closer to the backline
Pair this up with your passive to do a ‘Gap Closer’ or ‘Retreat’
Has a pretty neat slow built in, so that you can give chase.

skill.name: Whirling Smash
skill.des: Alucard launches a whirling slash, dealing 320<font color='#D58E1F'>( +120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies.
skill.tips:
AOE damage skill made to target surroundings enemy
Pretty standard skill with no other effects lolol.
Super Low Cooldown at 5 seconds, make use of this skill to always proc your passive

skill.name: Fission Wave
skill.des:
Alucard absorbs the energy of enemies in the target direction, gaining 40% Physical Lifesteal and reducing Cooldown of other Skills to 50%, slowing the enemies by 40% for 4s, and marking them for 6s, during which his attacks against them will always trigger <font color='#404495'>(Pursuit)</font>.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Alucard releases a shockwave in the target direction, dealing 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit.
skill.tips:
Gives you insane lifesteal
Pretty Dope damage on the last attack
Your one skill that allows you to have higher sustain compared any other heroes.
Both parts of the skill allows you to proc your passive
Lifesteal on different targets differs.

skill.name: Pursuit
skill.des:
Alucard's skills deal 1.5 times damage when only one enemy is hit. After each skill cast, his next Basic Attack deals 1.2 times damage and allows him to dash to the target's location.
Alucard's skills benefit from 50% of his Physical Lifesteal.
skill.tips:
This passive gives Aluchan the “chasing effect” using your AA after every skills will move you to the target you’re trying to attack.
This works on all targets, including Towers so do take note.
Always use your AA after every skill to make use of passives extra damage.

item.tips:
Max “2” first, for more sustain damage.
Since leveling “1” only increases your damage, the distance of the jump doesn’t increase, you can level this slowly.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Haas' Claws
des: Unique Passive - Insanity: Gains 15% extra Physical Lifesteal when below 50% HP.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
Item 1: [Endless Battle]
Reason: This is your core item, it will be your only item with lifesteal and thanks to its passive of giving you true damage on your AA after every skill, this could say be one of the best item for Alucard.
Item 2: [Warrior Boots]
Reasons: This boots, gives you armor every time you gets hit. It’s a pretty good item if you’re always going into the fight.
Item 3: [Magic Blade]
Reasons: Another core item, This item gives you a “second” lifeline… More like more HP so that you can last longer in a fight. Thanks to the current Burst Meta. This is more important than you think.

besty.best_mate_tips: Mages like Kagura or Aurora are ideal partners, Having a good disable allows you to deal more damage to the enemy. Since Mages usually require someone to deal a decent amount of damage early game to farm faster.
besty.name: Aurora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Heroes with Low burst skills, Usually Tanks and Fighters, with his Lifesteal abilities, he can pretty much 1v1 and even 1v2 enemies with ease so long as he doesn’t encounter any Hard CCs *Making myself clear, Burst as in ONE HIT WONDERS LIKE EUDORA* Fighters generally has very consistent high damage throughout like Marksmans.
counter.name: Layla

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Karina, You won’t be able to hit her when she procs “1” so yeah basically you can only use your skills to pop her. Pretty much allows her to avoid about ⅓ of your full damage.
countered_by.name: Karina

skill.name: Dance of Blades
skill.des:
Karina enters the <font color='#404495'>(Dance of Blades)</font> state for 3.5s, during which she gains 45% extra Movement Speed, blocks all incoming Basic Attacks, and reflects 100<font color='#27C0C7'>( +30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> back to the attacker (the damage reflection effect has a cooldown of 0.4s).
Karina's next Basic Attack within the duration deals 150<font color='#27C0C7'>( +55% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>, slows the target by 45% for 1s, and is guaranteed to critically strike. Casting the enhanced Basic Attack or <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Assault)</font> ends the <font color='#404495'>(Dance of Blades)</font> state early.
skill.tips: This first skill have OP effects, speed increases, enhanced basic attack with guaranteed crits and slows. No matter if you're escaping or pursuing, this skill is useful. The penetrating basic attack's extra effects can be used to deal devastating damage. Kills and assists will also substantially reduce this skill's cooldown, making this another one of Karina's core clean up abilities.

skill.name: Dance of Death
skill.des: Karina launches a spinning slash, dealing 375<font color='#27C0C7'>( +125% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies.
skill.tips: AoE damage, mainly used in the early game to quickly proc your passive effect, max this last.

skill.name: Shadow Assault
skill.des:
Karina dashes to the target enemy hero, dealing them 350<font color='#27C0C7'>( +160% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>, applying a <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Mark)</font> to them, and leaving a <font color='#404495'>(Shadowform)</font> behind them. The <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Mark)</font> and <font color='#404495'>(Shadowform)</font> both last 5s. If the enemy dies within the duration, the cooldown of this skill is reset.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Karina dashes back to the <font color='#404495'>(Shadowform)</font>'s location, dealing 150<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies along the way.
skill.tips: Mobility skill, during team fights use this carefully, for using it incorrectly will make you lose your escape. Use it when you know you can get the skill, don't hesitate when using. Kills will refresh the cooldown, while assists will substantially reduce the cooldown allowing Karina to finish off enemies continually with burst damage.

skill.name: Shadow Combo
skill.des:
Karina's third consecutive attack on the same enemy deals extra <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> equal to 50 plus 5<font color='#27C0C7'>( +3% Total Magic Power)</font>% of their lost HP (up to 2000 <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> against creeps).
If the target is an enemy hero, the cooldowns of Karina's non-Ultimate skills are reduced by 1.5s.
skill.tips: This is Karina's key skill for securing kills, due to it doing more damage to low health targets. The true damage effect ignores the enemy's physical and magical resists.

item.tips:
Level up 1st skill first.Then level up 2nd skill.
Retribution - Increasing your jungle efficiency would be the best choice.

equip.name: Shadow Twinblades
des: Unique Passive - Assassination: If no damage is dealt to or taken from enemy heroes within 5s, the next Basic Attack deals 200 plus 50% Magic Power as extra Magic Damage and slows the target by 60% for 1.5s.

equip.name: Ice Hunter's Arcane Boots
des: Unique Passive - Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal <2|lv 2> + <1005 0.02> True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equip.name: Calamity Reaper
des: Unique Passive - Calamity: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 120% Magic Power as extra True Damage and grants 10% extra Movement Speed (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Concentrated Energy
des: Unique Passive - Recharge: Recovers 10% Max HP on hero kills.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

gear.tips: Upgrade your jungle item to Plunderer Axe, which you can sell in the late game for something more slot efficient. Clock of Destiny to give Karina HP and MP, so that she has some staying power, build it as the second last time or if you're ahead, as if in the early game if you don't have enough magical damage, it really doesn't matter how much mana you have. When jungling, roam heaps and try to adapt to your team's movements. In the end game aim for squishies or wounded enemies.

besty.best_mate_tips: Diggie’s ultimate can help out Karina in a pinch, and Cyclops’ ultimate can create more opportunities for Karina to deal damage.
besty.name: Diggie

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Karina’High Mobility make her a nightmare to marksmans and mages who have no displacement skills.
counter.name: Odette

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Akai’s ultimate can effectively stop assassins from attacking.
countered_by.name: Akai

skill.name: Headbutt
skill.des:
Akai charges in the target direction, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way. If Akai hits an enemy hero during this process, he'll knock them airborne for 0.5s and be able to roll in the Joystick's direction once.
Akai can cast <font color='#404495'>(Headbutt)</font> during <font color='#404495'>(Heavy Spin)</font> to quickly adjust his position.
skill.tips: The long-ranged jump allows for a strong engage into the enemy back line, a narrow escape across walls or just a really good ambush. Remember that when enemy's are marked by Blender (with the Froggy symbol floating on their heads) jumping on them will stun them.

skill.name: Body Slam
skill.des: Akai smashes the ground with his body, dealing 270<font color='#47BE34'>( +6% Total HP)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 2s.
skill.tips: Blender is Akai's poking skill. The projectile explodes upon impact or at maximum range, and has a relatively wide AoE, making it very easy to mark targets. The most important part of this ability is that attacking targets marked by Blender allows Akai to deal extra 5% of Akai's Max HP as physical damage, which is A WHOLE LOT OF FREAKING DAMAGE.

skill.name: Heavy Spin
skill.des:
Akai removes all debuffs on him and spins for 4s, gaining Slow Immunity while continuously dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Enemy heroes knocked back will knock back other heroes they collide with during the process.
Akai also gradually increases his Movement Speed to 70% over the duration. This skill can only be interrupted by Suppression and Morph effects.
skill.tips: Hurricane Dance is Akai's disruptive skill. Aside from the annoying knock back and wall pinning, Akai is immune to slowdown effects and has increased movement speed during the ULT duration. Akai's ULT also works as a Purify which clears all CC and Stun effects on him.

skill.name: Tai Chi
skill.des:
Akai gains a 25<font color='#47BE34'>( +4% Total HP)</font> shield for 4s on each skill cast and can mark enemy heroes and creeps hit by his skills.
Akai's Basic Attacks deal 25<font color='#47BE34'>( +4% Total HP)</font> extra <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to marked enemies.
skill.tips: Getting a Shield on every skill cast makes Akai rathertanky during the early game, as well as provides a lot of opportunities foroutplays. The extra shield makes Akai a very formidable opponent in a 1v1scenario. When jungling, space out the usage of Skill 1 and Skill 2 to allow your shield to tank the damage from the jungle monsters, as Akai's passive shield has an internal cooldown.

item.tips:
Max Skill 1 if team fight happens more often, since Skill 1 is easier to land.Max Skill 2 if game is stale, since Skill 2 has better poke.
As mentioned before, Petrify is really good for peel, disengage, repositioning as well as some extra CC.

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Warrior Boots - Conceal
des: Active Skill - Conceal: Success

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

equip.name: Athena's Shield
des: Unique Passive - Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, gains 25% Magic Damage Reduction for 3s (applied before taking damage). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

equip.name: Guardian Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Recovery: Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

gear.tips:
As always, builds aren't fixed, especially for tanks. But these are my two general builds.
1) If you want to play more fighter like, you can take Blade of the 7 Seas earlier on.
2) If you want to have some fun with the AoE slow, you can try Thunder Belt.
3) If enemy has a lot of Crit, for example Marksman, Heart of Steel is a very good alternative item.

besty.best_mate_tips: Akai can ULT from behind and push the enemies toward Saber, while Saber can ULT the priority target and finish the job.
besty.name: Saber

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Akai's ULT will knockback a Karina, preventing them from landing a proper attack or proper engage.
counter.name: Karina

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Due to their knockup abilities from ULT. However, these have to be perfectly timed so that Akai's ULT is cancelled.
countered_by.name: Grock

skill.name: Iron Hook
skill.des: Franco launches an iron hook at a designated direction. The hook will snag the first enemy unit hit, dealing 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and dragging them to Franco.
skill.tips: Skill ini adalah Skill yang paling mengerikan dari Franco. Umumnya bila berhasil menarik lawan ke arah teman satu tim Anda, kemungkinan besar akan membunuh lawan yang tertarik tersebut. Hanya saja Skill ini tidak mudah untuk digunakan.

skill.name: Fury Shock
skill.des: Franco lashes out, dealing <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> equal to 300 plus 4% of his Max HP to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70% for 1.5s.
skill.tips: Fury Shock adalah Skill AOE yang memiliki efek Slow. Skill ini dapat digunakan untuk membersihkan Lane atau mencegah lawan untuk melarikan diri setelah tertarik oleh Hook Franco.

skill.name: Bloody Hunt
skill.des: Franco suppresses the target enemy hero for 1.8s and strikes them 6 times over the duration, each time dealing 50<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Brutal Massacre juga merupakan Skill Follow Up yang digunakan setelah berhasil menarik lawan dengan Hook Anda. Skill ini memiliki efek Stun yang dapat mencegah lawan melarikan diri atau memberikan waktu kepada teman satu tim Anda untuk menghabisi lawan yang terkena Stun dari Brutal Massacre.

skill.name: Wasteland Force
skill.des:
If no damage is taken within 5s, Franco gains 10% extra Movement Speed, regenerates 1% Max HP per second, and begins accumulating <font color='#404495'>(Wasteland Force)</font> (up to 10 stacks).
Franco will consume all the <font color='#404495'>(Wasteland Force)</font> stacks on his next skill cast, increasing the skill's damage by up to 150%.
skill.tips: Wasteland Force adalah Skill pasif yang membuat Franco menjadi Ganker sekaligus Tank yang menakutkan. Pasif ini membuat Anda bertahan lebih lama di Lane dan memudahkan Anda untuk mengambil posisi dengan baik di dalam semak-semak.

item.tips:
Maksimalkan Skill 1 terlebih dahulu, kemudian naikkan Skill 2, ambil Ultimate bila tersedia.
Setiap menaikkan Skill 1, jarak Hook Franco akan bertambah jauh dan memudahkannya untuk menarik lawan.
Flicker dapat dikombinasikan dengan Iron Hook Franco saat berhasil mengenai lawan, agar lawan yang tertarik dapat menjadi lebih dekat dengan teman satu tim Anda atau ditembak oleh Turret.
Flicker juga dapat digunakan sebelum melakukan Iron Hook untuk memperkecil jarak lawan dengan Anda.
Weaken dapat digunakan untuk melarikan diri atau memperlambat Movement lawan sekaligus melemahkannya saat Anda mengejar.

equip.name: Thunder Belt
des: Unique Passive - Thunderbolt: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 50 plus 5% of the hero's extra HP as extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them and slows them by 40%-80% (scales with the hero's extra HP) for 1s (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Rapid Boots- Conceal
des: Active Skill - Conceal: Success

equip.name: Cursed Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: Deals Magic Damage equal to 0.8% of the hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 210% to 350% against creeps and minions (scales with level).

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Guardian Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Recovery: Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

gear.tips: Build ini memberikan CDR yang cukup untuk Franco, sekaligus membuatnya dapat bertahan lebih lama dalam pertempuran.

besty.best_mate_tips: Odette adalah salah satu Hero Partner terbaik Franco. Saat Franco melancarkan CC terhadap lawan atau berhasil menarik lawan, Odette dapat menghabisi lawan dengan Ultimate-nya atau melakukan Follow Up CC.
besty.name: Odette

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Gord saat mengeluarkan Ultimate tidak dapat bergerak, hal ini memudahkan Franco untuk membidiknya dengan Iron Hook. Tidak hanya itu, Franco juga dapat dengan mudah menggagalkan Ultimate Gord Dengan Iron Hook atau dengan Ultimate Franco sendiri.
counter.name: Gord

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Fanny memiliki mobilitas yang sangat tinggi sehingga Franco sangat sulit untuk melakukan Iron Hook terhadapnya. Bila Fanny berada di dekat Anda, usahakan untuk menggunakan Ultimate Anda terlebih dahulu kemudian Follow up dengan Iron Hook Anda untuk memaksimalkan Iron Hook Anda mengenai target.
countered_by.name: Fanny

skill.name: Crab Claw Cannon
skill.des:
Bane fires his Crab Claw Cannon in the target direction, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +160% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit and then 150% damage to a random enemy behind them (prioritizes enemy heroes). Killing the first enemy increases the second hit's damage to 200%. Enemies hit are slowed by 10<font color='#27C0C7'>( +10% Total Magic Power)</font>% for 1s.
Every 100 <font color='#D58E1F'>(Physical Attack)</font> Bane possesses additionally reduces this skill's cooldown by 5%.
skill.tips: Menghasilkan Physical Damage serta efek Slow kepada target. Tidak hanya itu, Armor musuh yang terkena skill 1 Bane juga akan terkurang selama 2 detik.

skill.name: Ale
skill.des:
Bane chugs his ale, recovering 200<font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 6<font color='#27C0C7'>( +3% Total Magic Power)</font>% of his lost HP and gaining 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Bane spits venom in the target direction, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>( +180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> (scales up to 150% with charging time) to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Every 100 <font color='#27C0C7'>(Magic Power)</font> Bane possesses additionally reduces this skill's cooldown by 7%.
skill.tips: Bane akan mengeluarkan gentong yang dapat memulihkan HP yang ada di dekat gentong tersebut. (HP teman satu tim juga akan bertambah)

skill.name: Deadly Catch
skill.des:
Bane summons a school of sharks to charge in the target direction, dealing 600<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+170% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies hit, knocking them airborne for 0.8s, and slowing them by 65% (decays over 3s).
This skill deals 40% damage to turrets.
skill.tips: Bane akan mengeluarkan kapal yang terbang dan menjatuhkan meriam kepada siapa saja yang berada di bawahnya, termasuk Turret.

skill.name: Shark Bite
skill.des: Bane infuses his weapon with a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Tidal Energy)</font> each time he casts a skill (up to 2 stacks). Each of his subsequent Basic Attacks consumes a stack to deal <font color='#D58E1F'>( +135% Total Physical Attack)</font>-<font color='#D58E1F'>( +170% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies (scales with level).
skill.tips: Setiap 6 detik sekali Basic Attack Bane akan meningkat dan menimbulkan Splash, musuh yang berada di belakang target yang dipukul akan terkena Damage yang sangat besar dan mendapatkan efek Slow. (termasuk Turret).

item.tips:
1= Skill 1
2= Skill 2
U= Skill Ultimate

1 - 2 - 1 - U - 1 - 2 - 1 - U - 1 - 2 - 1 - U - 2 - 2 - 2

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Hunter Strike
des: Unique Passive - Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips: Rapis Boots - Bloodlust Axe - Hunter Strike - Malefic Roar - Berserker's Fury - Blade of Despair

besty.best_mate_tips: Bane is best suited in the lane with the hero Zhask for taking turrets, dominating early game and ending the match at a very quick pace.
besty.name: Zhask

counter.restrain_hero_tips: In early game, it is good to go up against natalia or other assasins as his passive ability spams nicely and his tanky nature discourages direct attack.
counter.name: Natalia

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Fighters, especially Zilong can easily but down bane as bane does not deal much physical damage via auto attacks and his 3rd skill can be easily dodged if enemy heroes are not disabled.
countered_by.name: Zilong

skill.name: Volley Shot
skill.des:
Bruno kicks a Powerball on his next Basic Attack, dealing 145<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the target, slowing them by 30%, and speeding up by 30% for 0.5s.
The Powerball then bounces back toward Bruno and lands on the ground. He or allied heroes can retrieve the Powerball for another attack and reduce the cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Flying Tackle)</font> by 1s.
skill.tips: Gunakan Skill ini saat War dan arahkan posisi tembakan ke dalam area yang mudah dijangkau kembali atau dapat dijangkau rekan 1 team, Karena jika bola diambil kembali atau diambil oleh rekan 1 team skill ini dapat digunakan kembali (Reset Cooldown).

skill.name: Flying Tackle
skill.des:
Bruno makes a slide tackle in the target direction, dealing 140<font color='#D58E1F'>( +40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in his path and stunning them for 0.5s.
If the Powerball is bouncing back, Bruno also draws the Powerball toward him.
skill.tips: Gunakan Skill ini saat War untuk membuat Stun lawan yang terkena Flying Tackle, jangan lupa sebelum menggunakan skill ini gunakan Skill 1 dan perhatikan kemana arah bola tersebut dan gunakan Skill Flying Tackle ke arah bola tadi agar dapat menggunakan Skill Flying Tackle kembali dan gunakan untuk melarikan jika terdesak saat dikejar lawan, Skill ini juga dapat digunakan untuk menembus tembok.

skill.name: Worldie
skill.des: Bruno kicks his Energy Ball at the target enemy hero, dealing them 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +83% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and knocking them back. The Energy Ball then bounces between nearby enemies up to 10 times, each time dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Each hit also reduces the enemy's Physical Defense by 4% for 8s (up to 3 stacks).
skill.tips:
Gunakan Skill ini pada saat War, saat tendangan pertama mengenai musuh, Skill ini akan memberikan Knockback ini sangat bagus untuk memundurkan salah satu musuh yang mendekat.
Gunakan skill ini pada saat musuh saling berdekatan satu sama lain atau saat mereka berkumpul, karena Skill ini dapat memantul apa bila musuh berdekatan.

skill.name: Mecha Legs
skill.des:
Bruno gains 2% extra Crit Chance each time he deals damage with his skills (up to 10 stacks).
Bruno has higher Physical Attack but only gains 80% extra Attack Speed from all sources.
skill.tips: Setiap menggunakan Skill, Critical Hit Bruno akan selalu meningkat, dsini kita dapat memanfaatkanya dengan cara selalu menggunakan Skill saat War agar Critical Hit Bruno meningkat dan menyebabkan Damage yang besar.

item.tips:
memaksimalkan skill 1 dan ultimate terlebih dahulu bila tersedia agar dapat memberikan Damage yang maksimal pada saat War.
Inspire akan meningkatkan kecepatan serangan Anda.
Purify dapat membantu Anda untuk melepaskan diri dari CC lawan.

Item diatas adalah set Build bruno yang dikhususkan untuk menjadi Marksman yang optimal baik dari segi Skill atau Basic Attack.

besty.best_mate_tips: Bruno sangat terbantu oleh Hero yang memiliki Skill AOE yang memiliki CC dan membuat lawan terkumpul dalam 1 titik, karena dapat membantu Bruno untuk memaksimalkan Damage dari Ultimate Bruno.
besty.name: Ruby

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Clone Sun memudahkan Bruno untuk memaksimalkan efek pantulan dari Ultimate-nya.
counter.name: Sun

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Hayabusa dapat dengan mudah menjangkau dan membunuh Bruno dalam sekejap tanpa perlawan sedikit pun dari Bruno.
countered_by.name: Hayabusa

skill.name: Quick Draw
skill.des:
Clint fires 5 bullets in quick succession in the target direction, each dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the enemy hit.
The bullets will spread evenly across enemies in a fan-shaped area. Enemies hit by multiple bullets will take less damage after the first bullet.
skill.tips: This skill has a powerful effect, but is relatively situational and has a small range. Use it to limit enemy movement and trigger Clint's passive.

skill.name: Trapping Recoil
skill.des:
Clint shoots a trap net in the target direction, slightly jumping back while dealing 140<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Total Physical Attack)</font><font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.2s.
Successfully hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of this skill by 40%.
skill.tips: Clint can fire this backwards when being chased, and can also use it to jump through walls. Has a wide range of applications.

skill.name: Grenade Bombardment
skill.des:
Clint launches a grenade in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing them 280<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slowing them by 25% for 1.2s.
Clint gains a grenade charge every 12s (up to 5).
skill.tips: High single-target damage and can be used frequently. Make sure you're stocked up on grenades before entering a team fight!

skill.name: Double Shot
skill.des: After each skill cast, Clint's next Basic Attack within 4s penetrates a line of enemies, dealing them 50<font color='#D58E1F'>( +120% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. This damage can trigger attack effects, and the part affected by Physical Attack can critically strike.
skill.tips: This is a very strong passive, and helps with sustainability in the laning phase, as well as reaching squishier back-row heroes.

item.tips:
Max 1st Skill.
Inspire - Increases attack speed, greatly improving any ADC's damage output.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Berserker's Fury
des: Unique Passive - Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.

equip.name: Scarlet Phantom
des: Unique Passive - Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 30% extra Attack Speed and 5% extra Crit Chance for 2s.

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

equip.name: Rose Gold Meteor
des: Unique Passive - Lifeline: When HP is about to drop below 30%, gains a 280-700 shield (scales with level) and 12 extra Magic Defense for 3s (40s cooldown).

gear.tips: The first big priority here is Berserker's Fury, followed by Endless Battle. Maintain your position in the back row and frequently use skills to trigger Quick Draw and Endless Battle's passive effect. Deadly Blade can limit the enemy's ability to retaliate.

besty.best_mate_tips: Clint and Aurora’s long-range pokes work together perfectly, and Aurora’s control and slow effects can help Clint to land more skill shots.
besty.name: Aurora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: you Can take advantage with your long range.
counter.name: Balmond

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Clint is easy prey for assassins.
countered_by.name: Saber

skill.name: Light of Retribution
skill.des: Rafaela strikes three nearest enemies with <font color='#404495'>(Light of Retribution)</font>, dealing them 225<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>, briefly revealing their positions, and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. Enemies hit by <font color='#404495'>(Light of Retribution)</font> again within 5s will take 20% extra damage (up to 3 stacks).
skill.tips: This is the main damage skill of Rafaela, and at the same time, is the biggest debuffs skill from her too. With the correct equipments, this skill is not only about revealing enemy's stealth and slow them down, it can also burn, reduce enemy's regen effects and even reduce enemy's defense too!

skill.name: Holy Healing
skill.des: Rafaela calls upon <font color='#404495'>(Holy Light)</font>, restoring 100<font color='#27C0C7'>( +25% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to nearby allied heroes, plus an addiitional 150<font color='#27C0C7'>( +25% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to herself and the most injured allied hero in range, and increasing Movement Speed by 50% for 1.5s.
skill.tips: This the healing skill, in contrast of her damage-skill, there no equipment to give her better buffs, and yet, this is the skill what most people expect from her.

skill.name: Holy Baptism
skill.des: Rafaela unleashes the true power of <font color='#404495'>(Holy Light)</font> in the target direction, dealing 460<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in a line and stunning them for 1.5s.
skill.tips: In early game, you can trick you enemy to dive into your turret and stun him, then let the turret do its job, be aware of the enemy's minion, if there is any, wait for them to hit you once first.

skill.name: Deity Penalization
skill.des: Upon death, Rafaela turns into a beam of <font color='#404495'>(Holy Light)</font> and launches herself at her killer after a 2s delay, dealing them <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> equal to 20% of their Max HP. The attack can be blocked by other enemy heroes. This effect won't be triggered if the killer is a non-hero enemy or if they're too far away.
skill.tips: This passive may be seems like a joke, but if you know how to take advantage of this, be sure that no enemy can run away from you, same as be sure that you can save your low-hp teammates!

item.tips:
Upgrape Holy Healing S2 first.
Purify will be surely helpful since you must survive in order to assist your teammates.

equip.name: Enchanted Talisman
des: Unique Passive - Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.

equip.name: Demon Shoes - Favor
des: Unique Passive - Passive - Favor: Success

equip.name: Necklace of Durance
des: Unique Passive - Gift: Regenerates 20% Max HP and Mana over 2s after leveling up.

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

equip.name: Guardian Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Recovery: Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

gear.tips: There are 3 gears that is a must for a support-type Rafaela. After getting those 3 gears, you are already in middle game and its time to check your team and enemy's team build for your next 3 gears.

besty.best_mate_tips: Both are pretty slow and squishy, but if they use their passives correctly, may be a deadly duo. Miya's passive make her basic attacks faster while Rafaela's passive can catch up a enemies easily for Miya to finish off.
besty.name: Miya

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Rafaela's Holy of Retribution can easily force Natalia out of her invisible mode so she can't attacks teammates from behind.
counter.name: Natalia

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: His ultimate's slowdown may put Rafaela's into a dangerous situation and can easily kill her with the right combos.
countered_by.name: Harley

skill.name: Forked Lightning
skill.des:
Eudora casts fork lightning in a target direction, dealing 350<font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area.
Enemies affected by <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font> will take 190<font color='#27C0C7'>( +30% Total Magic Power)</font> extra <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> after a short delay.
skill.tips: Use Skill 2 first before using skill 1, this will reduce their magic resistance, allowing skill 1 to do more damage.

skill.name: Ball Lightning
skill.des:
Eudora hurls an orb of lightning at the target enemy, dealing them 350<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>, stunning them for 1.2s, and reducing their Magic Defense by 10 for 1.8s.
If the enemy is affected by <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font>, the lightning orb will bounce to up to 3 nearby enemies, dealing them 175<font color='#27C0C7'>( +40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and stunning them for 0.6s (prioritizes enemy heroes).
skill.tips: When being ganked or helping out teammates, you can try using Skill 1 first before skill 2 so the stun lasts longer.

skill.name: Thunder’s Wrath
skill.des:
Eudora calls down a blast of lightning on the target enemy, dealing them 480<font color='#27C0C7'>( +180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>.
If the enemy is affected by <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font>, dark clouds will form over their head and send down an extra lightning strike on the area below after a 0.8s delay, dealing 440<font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies within and 360<font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies.
skill.tips: Best to use after casting other spells, for maximum damage potential.

skill.name: Superconductor
skill.des: Eudora's skills inflict <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font> for 3s on hit and can trigger additional effects against enemies affected by <font color='#404495'>(Superconductor)</font>.
skill.tips: Skill gives the target a Superconductor effect which will amplify the effects of other abilities.

item.tips: Eudora has weak mobility, Flicker will increase her mobility

equip.name: Lightning Truncheon
des: Unique Passive - Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill deals 50-1000 extra Magic Damage (scales with Max Mana) to up to 3 enemies.

equip.name: Genius Wand
des: Unique Passive - Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3-7 (scales with level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Fleeting Time
des: Unique Passive - Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

equip.name: Divine Glaive
des: Unique Passive - Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

gear.tips: Focus on getting 40% cooldown reduction as the main goal, secondly go for as much magic power as possible to maximize your damage. Then  get Holy Crystal and Devil's Tear to further guarantee your DPS potential,lastly get Concentrated Energy for survivability during team fights.

besty.best_mate_tips: The range of Eudora’s second skill is relatively short, therefore it can be difficult landing hits on enemies. Zilong can knock enemies back to her, allowing her to unleash her awesome burst damage.
besty.name: Zilong

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Assassins should be wary of Eudora’s control skills and burst damage in team battles.
counter.name: Saber

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Aurora’s range is longer than Eudora’s, thus she can easily kill Eudora in seconds.
countered_by.name: Aurora

skill.name: Spear Flip
skill.des: Zilong flings the target enemy over his head, dealing them 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Early laning phase, wait for enemy soldiers to push to tower, and when soldiers are gone, try to hook enemy into tower

skill.name: Spear Strike
skill.des:
Zilong lunges at the target enemy, dealing them 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and reducing their Physical Defense by 15 for 2s. He then launches a Basic Attack on the same target.
The cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Spear Strike)</font> is reset each time Zilong kills an enemy.
skill.tips: Use with 1st skill, otherwise can be used to jump walls for escape, such as using enemy jungle minions.

skill.name: Supreme Warrior
skill.des: Zilong removes all Slowing Effects on him and gains 40% Movement Speed, 45% Attack Speed, and Slow Immunity for 7.5s. For the duration, he can trigger <font color='#404495'>(Dragon Flurry)</font> after every 2 Basic Attacks (instead of the previous 3).
skill.tips: Can be used to chase enemies or to run away. Can be used on cast to remove crowd control.

skill.name: Dragon Flurry
skill.des: After every 3 Basic Attacks, Zilong triggers <font color='#404495'>(Dragon Flurry)</font> on the next Basic Attack, hitting the target 3 times. Each hit deals 50% Basic Attack damage and heals himself for <font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> HP.
skill.tips: During early laning phase, attack enemy minions to trigger his passive ability that allows him  to attack the hero behind minions

item.tips:
Max S2, then S1, if ultimate is available then level it up
Retribution - For more efficient jungling and faster leveling

equip.name: Corrosion Scythe
des: Unique Passive - Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equip.name: Demon Hunter Sword
des: Unique Passive - Devour: Basic Attacks deal 9% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).

equip.name: Golden Staff
des: Unique Passive - Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

gear.tips: This set has amazing CD recovery times. Allows Zilong to use his ultimate more frequently. Also has a high potential in assisting teammates more. Dominance Ice for physical defence and  Magic Blade for magical defence, along with a shield effect. Can run with ease or turn on enemy with ease.

besty.best_mate_tips: Zilong’s first skill can flip enemies back to Eudora, allowing Eudora to release her full damage potential.
besty.name: Eudora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Heroes without displacement skills are very vulnerable to Zilong’s skillset.
counter.name: Yi Sun-shin

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: It’s very hard for Zilong to beat these heroes in 1v1 battles.
countered_by.name: Alucard

skill.name: Tornado Strike
skill.des: Fanny whirls her blades, dealing 320<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies.
skill.tips: Use this skill to clear jungle or lane. You have to keep in mind to save your Energy. Don't only spam this skill to kill Jungle Monster faster, because you will miss the opportunity to kill the enemy or to cover the turret.

skill.name: Steel Cable
skill.des:
Fanny shoots a cable in the target direction that pulls her to the first obstacle hit. She can cast this skill again within 2s until her energy runs out. Each successive cast reduces the skill's energy cost by 2.
As long as her energy is sufficient, Fanny automatically casts <font color='#404495'>(Tornado Strike)</font> upon hitting an enemy mid-flight.
skill.tips: This skill will be synergied with Tornado Strike to the enemies nearby in your flying area and deals damage to them. The skill is a must in a battlefield and to master using Fanny, you have to master the skill.

skill.name: Cut Throat
skill.des: Fanny strikes the target enemy or creep with her blades, dealing them 500<font color='#D58E1F'>( +240% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. Each stack of <font color='#404495'>(Prey Mark)</font> on the enemy increases this damage by 20%.
skill.tips: This skill is used to kill enemy. After you give a Prey Mark to your enemy, using the skill will deals lethal damage. But, without Prey Mark, the skill is useless, unless to get a kill to enemy with low HP.

skill.name: Air Superiority
skill.des: During flight, Fanny deals 10%-20% extra damage to enemies hit (scales with flying speed) and applies a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Prey Mark)</font> to them (up to 2 stacks) on each attack. Her subsequent skill hits on marked enemy heroes restore 8 energy per stack for her. The energy restoration is reduced if she hits multiple enemy heroes within a short period of time.

item.tips: Maximize the tornado strike level first to deal massive damage. If you can control your energy well, it will grant you massive damage to kill an enemy. Faster jungling = more golds = more kills.

equip.name: Flame Hunter's Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: Queen's Wings
des: Unique Passive - Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 20% Damage Reduction and 35% extra Spell Vamp for 5s (60s cooldown).

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips: This build will make Fanny more tanky. Using boots here to make you save the energy by walking. You can get 2 shields with the build, 1 from M. Blade and 1 from A.Shield. Make sure to attack when you have shield from A.Shield. This will make you able to sustain some damage.

besty.name: Grock
