skill.name: Malefic Bomb
skill.des:
Layla fires a Malefic Bomb in the target direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit (can critically strike).
Upon hitting an enemy, Layla's Basic Attacks and <font color='#404495'>(Void Projectile)</font> gain extra range for 3s, and she gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s. The duration of the Movement Speed boost is doubled if an enemy hero is hit.
skill.tips: This skill can shoot in a straight target. This is perfect if you want to slowly cut down your foe. But take note that you will need to use this skill wisely.

skill.name: Void Projectile
skill.des:
Layla fires an orb of Malefic Energy at the target enemy that explodes on hit, dealing 170<font color='#D58E1F'>( +65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to targets in the area and applying a <font color='#404495'>(Magic Mark)</font> on them for 3s.
When Layla hits an enemy with a <font color='#404495'>(Magic Mark)</font>, she deals 100<font color='#D58E1F'>( +35% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and stuns them for 0.5s.
skill.tips: The Range of this skill will surely increase whenever the skill is being upgraded. This is totally useful when you want to slow your opponent's movement speed when pursuing it.

skill.name: Destruction Rush
skill.des:
Layla fires a blast of Malefic Energy in the target direction, dealing 500<font color='#D58E1F'>( +150% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in a line.
<font color='#404495'>(Passive:)</font> The range of Layla's <font color='#404495'>(Void Projectile)</font> and Basic Attacks is increased by 0.6 units. Her sight range is also slightly increased each time this skill is upgraded.
skill.tips: The beams can go through walls or rocks. So this is useful if you are stealing your teammate's kills. Just joking. You can use this to reduce your foe's HP greatly. Whenever the skill is upgraded, its basic attack range or basic attack distance will be increased by 0.4%. Use this wisely.

skill.name: Malefic Gun
skill.des: Layla deals increased damage to enemies farther away from her (from 100% to 130%, reaches the maximum at 6 units).
skill.tips: Keep a long distance from your foe if you want to beat your foes easily. This is quiet useful for her by the way.

item.tips: Layla's basic attack damage deals huge damage upon her foes. Increasing her attack speed greatly can make her become more unstoppable.

equip.name: Haas' Claws
des: Unique Passive - Insanity: Gains 15% extra Physical Lifesteal when below 50% HP.

equip.name: Windtalker
des: Unique Passive - Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can critically strike and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)

equip.name: Berserker's Fury
des: Unique Passive - Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.

equip.name: Scarlet Phantom
des: Unique Passive - Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 30% extra Attack Speed and 5% extra Crit Chance for 2s.

equip.name: Rose Gold Meteor
des: Unique Passive - Lifeline: When HP is about to drop below 30%, gains a 280-700 shield (scales with level) and 12 extra Magic Defense for 3s (40s cooldown).

gear.tips: You can see that she had two lifesteals, one strong and heavy armor, one item that improves her movement and attack speed, and two items that increases her crit chance and basic attack. This is the perfect build for layla. Close for Burst. Its up to you though.

besty.best_mate_tips: Franco should be the one hooking through their foes, pushing their foes into them while the Layla will try to attack it.
besty.name: Franco

counter.restrain_hero_tips: With Layla's Malefic Gun and her Void Projectile, she can easily slow down Chou and track him down. Layla is like a hunter whenever she wants to hunt Chou down.
counter.name: Chou

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Eudora can deal massive damages against the Marksman, especially to Layla.
countered_by.name: Eudora

skill.name: Despair Stomp
skill.des:
Minotaur jumps to the target location, dealing 280<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the area and knocking them airborne, reducing their Movement Speed by 40% and Attack Speed by 30% for 3s, while enhancing his Basic Attacks within the same duration. The enhanced Basic Attacks deal <font color='#47BE34'>( +3% Total HP)</font> extra <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> on hit.
<font color='#404495'>(Enraged)</font>: Minotaur attacks enemies in a wider area and deals <font color='#47BE34'>( +3% Total HP)</font> extra <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: As stated Despair Hammer deals great damage especially in rage mode. Maximize it first next to the ultimate for greater crowd control. Minotaur is a manaless hero so abuse using this skill for greater CS.

skill.name: Motivation Roar
skill.des:
Minotaur motivates himself and nearby allied heroes, restoring 260 HP for them and healing himself according to his lost HP. He also increases his and the allies' Attack Speed by 30% for 3s.
<font color='#404495'>(Enraged)</font>: Minotaur gains <font color='#404495'>(Enraged Regen)</font> for 2s, during which he restores HP each time he's hit by a Basic Attack.
skill.tips: Known as a healing ability, Very good sustain better than Rafaela wherein you don’t need to spend mana to regen your HP. This skill is usually maximized during rage mode because aside from great heal, this will allow Minotaur to have a great Physical and magic defense.

skill.name: Minoan Fury
skill.des:
Minotaur begins channeling, continuously gaining Rage. When at Max Rage, he can directly cast <font color='#404495'>(Enhanced Minoan Fury)</font> and enter the <font color='#404495'>(Enraged)</font> state.
<font color='#404495'>(Enhanced Minoan Fury)</font>: Minotaur smashes the ground 3 times, the first two times dealing 180<font color='#D58E1F'>( +85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 70%. The final hit deals 200<font color='#E5CB19'>( +85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> and knocks them airborne. When casting this skill, Minotaur is immune to control effects.
skill.tips: AoE damage and crowd control. This will makes your opponent helpless. With this skill they don’t have a chance to disengage unless they are going to use flicker. With a full AD build, your ultimate can do an insta kill to marksman and other squishy hero.

skill.name: Rage Incarnate
skill.des: Minotaur gains Rage each time he deals or takes damage. When at max Rage, he can cast <font color='#404495'>(Enhanced Minoan Fury)</font> to enter the <font color='#404495'>(Enraged)</font> state, gaining 20 (+3*Hero Level) extra Physical Attack and 10 (+4*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level), and enhanced skill effects. Cooldowns of his skills are also reset. After leaving the <font color='#404495'>(Enraged)</font> state, Minotaur will be unable to gain Rage or cast <font color='#404495'>(Minoan Fury)</font> for a while.
skill.tips: Be always on the lead. Position yourself in front of the creeps and more often, in front of the hero you're sharing the lane with. This will force your enemy hero and creeps to attack you first which will help your rage meter to be filled.

item.tips:
Main skill 1, level up the Ult when unlocked
Petrify can help you better control the enemy.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Warrior Boots - Favor
des: Unique Passive - Passive - Favor: Success

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Athena's Shield
des: Unique Passive - Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, gains 25% Magic Damage Reduction for 3s (applied before taking damage). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

equip.name: Antique Cuirass
des: Unique Passive - Deter: When struck by a skill, reduces the attacker's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s, capped at 3 stacks.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
1.Cursed Helmet - i'd suggest this item as your 1st, this increases hp and magic resistance, and to mention the burn passive. Mino only does a lil. Damage. Why not give him a burn, Mino is tough and this would be great for him
2. Tough boots/Rapid boots/Magic boots - This 3 boots is the movement speed i'd like to suggest. If enemies has the skill to disable then its tough boots. If they're good on escape, use rapid. If the need to skill use magic.
3. Blade Armor - this armor is the best against fighters and assassin also tanks, and marksman. It provides 100 armor against physical attacks. And the return damage is the best for mino has high HP.
4.BloodThirsty king - This armor provides increase HP. Also a kill is a regen. Even a tough mino needs life regen. And his 2nd is not enough. But with this item. Sure, let them come
5.Oracle - this armor provides increase in HP. also a good armor for magic resist with additional cooldown reduction. This will have you maximize his skills more for spamming.
6.Immortality - increase in magic resist and hp and the passive is great. and by the cooldown reaches it limit. Im sure mino wont be killed before the item activates again. But you could also use the demons advent or the ice armor thing

besty.best_mate_tips: He can protect marksman or mage will with his CS.
besty.name: Miya

counter.restrain_hero_tips: His Ultimate can interrupt Odette's Ultimate.
counter.name: Odette

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Go for hero that do good poke and kiting such as Gord, Miya, Clint, Bruno, Layla, Nana and for his biggest counter
countered_by.name: Gord

skill.name: Charge
skill.des: Lolita dashes in the target direction and enhances her next Basic Attack within 4s. The enhanced Basic Attack deals 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 7.5% of the target's Max HP as <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, stuns the target for 0.8s, and allows Lolita to jump to the target's location. This damage is increased to 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> plus 50% of the target's Max HP against minions.
skill.tips: At skill level 1 its 350 + 2.5%hp , at skill level 6 its 650 + 5% hp of damage. This will hurt quite alot when you are hitting enemy with high amount of HP, it even works with lord.

skill.name: Guardian's Bulwark
skill.des:
Lolita raises her shield to block all incoming ranged Basic Attacks and <font color='#404495'>(Projectiles)</font> from the target direction.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again:)</font> Lolita launches a blast of energy in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the explosion range. Each blocked attack increases this damage by 35% (up to 210%).
skill.tips: Try to use your shield only when you really need it, like blocking cyclop's ultimate.After blocking the damage, try to aim the Energy Blast to hit the lowest health target. You don't need to use it immediately as you have 4s to fire it.

skill.name: Noumenon Blast
skill.des:
Lolita triggers the shield from <font color='#404495'>(Noumenon Energy Core)</font> and begins channeling, slowing enemies in a fan-shaped area in the target direction by 75%. After 2s or when the channeling is interrupted, Lolita slams her hammer on the ground, dealing 350<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font>-700<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the same area. If the channeling is complete, she also stuns enemies hit for 2s.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again:)</font> Lolita stops channeling and slams her hammer on the ground.
skill.tips: Your ultimate chargeup animation will not be visible by the enemy team if they cannot see you while you are in the bush, so the stealth ult is stiill here after the remake.

skill.name: Noumenon Energy Core
skill.des: After not taking damage for 5s, Lolita gains a 300 (+40*Hero Level) shield for 20s. Allied heroes who approach Lolita within the next few seconds will also receive a shield.
skill.tips: If Lolita already has a shield and shield is fully charged, nearby Allies will receive the shield. So if there are 4 allies around you that doesnt have a shield, they will all receive it at the same time.

item.tips: Flicker is good to do combos and for chasing / escape

equip.name: Thunder Belt
des: Unique Passive - Thunderbolt: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 50 plus 5% of the hero's extra HP as extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them and slows them by 40%-80% (scales with the hero's extra HP) for 1s (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Warrior Boots - Encourage
des: Unique Passive - Passive - Encourage: Success

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Athena's Shield
des: Unique Passive - Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, gains 25% Magic Damage Reduction for 3s (applied before taking damage). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips: Start off with 1 magic necklace, if you are more agressive, buy 2 of them. If you are still using up mana quickly, buy dominance ice before Oracle. If you are laning against mages, get Oracle first. Only sell off your mana necklace if you need the extra gold or you are building your 5th / 6th item, get immortality before demon's advent if you are dying alot.

besty.best_mate_tips: Laning with him is really good because you both have crowd control and damage to kill anyone.
besty.name: Roger

counter.restrain_hero_tips: You can block each and every single attack so he is generally not a huge threat.
counter.name: Cyclops

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Kagura is a really slippery mage with multiple escape abilities. If you stun her with skill 1, she can get away easily. Her ultimate and teleporting to umbrella can cancel your ultimate, cancelling your most powerful skill. The only way to not get your ultimate interrupted is to pay attention to her skill usage. Make sure she have used both her umbrella teleport and dash, so she have no chance to cancel or escape your ultimate.
countered_by.name: Kagura

skill.name: Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken
skill.des:
Hayabusa shoots three returning shurikens in the target direction, each dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 35% for 2s. Enemies hit by multiple shurikens take only 30% of the damage after the first hit. Hayabusa restores 10 energy for each non-minion enemy hit.
<font color='#404495'>(Passive)</font>: Hayabusa gains 3% extra Spell Vamp each time <font color='#404495'>(Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken)</font> is leveled up.
skill.tips: Teleport right in front of the enemy and use this skill for maximum damage. Use this skill to harrass the enemy as much as possible. If an enemy is chasing you or your teammate when at low health, lower their movement speed with this to run away

skill.name: Ninjutsu: Quad Shadow
skill.des:
Hayabusa dashes in the target direction and releases four phantoms that travel in separate directions. The phantoms will remain at the end of their paths or attach themselves to the first enemy hero hit, dealing them 130<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and slowing them by 40% for 2s. Hayabusa will immediately stop if he hits an enemy hero during the dash.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Hayabusa teleports to a phantom's location and reduces the cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Ninjutsu: Phantom Shuriken)</font> by 1s. If the phantom is attached to an enemy hero, he also deals 130<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the enemy.
skill.tips: One of the best escape abilities in the game, use this to run away from enemies! Teleport onto the enemy and use your first skill to damage the enemy with maximum damage from 3 shurikens! If an enemy is chasing you or your teammate at low health, slow them down with this skill.

skill.name: Ougi: Shadow Kill
skill.des:
Hayabusa blends into the shadows and launches 6 single-target attacks on enemies in the area, each time dealing 140<font color='#D58E1F'>( +75% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
The attacks prioritize enemies with <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Mark)</font>, each consuming a stack to deal 45<font color='#D58E1F'>( +20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> extra <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, but doesn't apply additional <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Mark)</font> stacks or enjoy the bonus damage from <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Mark)</font>.
skill.tips: This ultimate makes you the fastest wave clearing character in the whole game. Don't hestitate to use your ultimate on a clump of minions. At max level, you can kill a full health mage with just this skill. If you are getting chased and your 2nd skill is on cooldown, buy time using the ultimate as it makes you invincible for a little while

skill.name: Ninjutsu: Trace of Shadow
skill.des: Hayabusa's attacks apply a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Mark)</font> on hit (up to 4 stacks). Each stack lasts 6s and increases Hayabusa's damage to the enemy by 5%.
skill.tips: Use the combo, teleport right into the enemy + 1st skill. When your teleporting shadow hits and enemy, it counts to the stack of the passive and if all    3 shurikens hit the enemy, you heal some health. This passive does not work on minions.

item.tips: The Retribution spell for all assassins. Helps immensely in farming, giving you the edge in battle. More farming=More gold=More items=Stronger. Constantly use this spell to farm and steal opponent jungle minions if possible.

equip.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
des: Unique Passive - Ambush: If no damage is dealt to or taken from enemy heroes within 5s, the next Basic Attack deals 160 plus 40% Physical Attack as extra Physical Damage and slows the target by 40% for 1.5s.

equip.name: Flame Hunter's Magic Shoes
des: Unique Passive - Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal <2|lv 2> + <1005 0.02> True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Hunter Strike
des: Unique Passive - Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
Bloodlust Axe - Hayabusa's ultimate deals massive damage, taking advantage of the healing on this item, giving him lots of sustain. A must buy when you play hayabusa.
Magic blade - A must have for assassins to avoid getting slayed by mages plus, it gives you a bit of protection from the shield to avoid death, This item is really good for assassins as its the best offensive-defensive hybrid item in the game and assassins benefit a lot from this

besty.best_mate_tips: Zilong can move displace the enemy and both of you can proceed to burst down the enemy. Zilong and Hayabusa are really dangerous at ambushing as both of them can deal massive damage quickly
besty.name: Zilong

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Harley has no disables, no stuns, just nothing! Don't hestitate to attack him at all. As long as he is not with his teammates, take the chance and kill him with your ultimate. He also can't run from you too as you too can teleport like harley.
counter.name: Harley

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: The queen on disables. Her freeze makes you unable to do anything, giving her teammates time to kill you. This is where purify comes in handy
countered_by.name: Aurora

skill.name: Leap of Faith
skill.des: Freya jumps to the target location, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and pulling them to the center.
skill.tips:
Only use it when you're sure that you'll land on the enemy as soon as you jump or else you will just be putting yourself in danger if you can't land that crowd control on them the moment you go in.
During a team fight, assess the situation of your team and if it looks bad. do not spam this skill if you only want to make damage since that skill is not freya's source of burst damage, save it instead for when you need to jump out and retreat from the battlefield.

skill.name: Spirit Combo
skill.des:
Freya strikes in the target direction, gaining a 160<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield while dealing 130<font color='#D58E1F'>( +90% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 0.5s. Freya can cast this skill again within 4s at the cost of 2 stacks of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font>.
On the <font color='#404495'>(3rd cast)</font>, Freya leaps into the air and smashes the area below, dealing 156<font color='#D58E1F'>( +108% Total Physical Attack)</font> damage to enemies within range and knocking them airborne for 0.5s.
skill.tips: Godspeed Strike is Freya's bread and butter. The skill that makes her really strong in team fights and 1v1 because of the crowd control it offers while enhancing her first 3 basic attacks, with a very low cooldown. It used to be op before as it was spammable but after the nerf, the cooldown now starts once you have done your 3rd basic attack. It's not that bad, the crowd control is still good and a strong/well fed freya can finish off the enemy in just one or 2 combo locks without taking much damage for herself. It is best that you activate this skill first before jumping in with Wings of Faith so that you can accurately lock your enemy with the stun.

skill.name: Valkyrie Descent
skill.des: Freya gains 6 stacks of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font> and enters the <font color='#404495'>(Valkyrie)</font> state, gaining a 600<font color='#D58E1F'>( +180% Total Physical Attack)</font> shield and 30 extra Physical Attack. Meanwhile, her Basic Attacks become ranged and deal splash damage. The <font color='#404495'>(Valkyrie)</font> state lasts 10s.
skill.tips: Valkyrie is Freya's ultimate and it's best used during team fights. It deals a decent amount of AoE damage as well as slowing the enemies down. It also enhances Freya's physical attack, armor and defense which makes her harder to kill during a fight and it also makes her deal more damage towards the opponent. Combine it with skill 2 and Freya can take down any squishy hero, even 2 of them at the same time if they get caught within her 3 sets of skills in less than 5 seconds.

skill.name: Power of Einherjar
skill.des:
After each skill cast, Freya gains massive extra Attack Speed on her next 2 Basic Attacks. This effect stacks up to 6 times.
Freya gains 1 stack of <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font> on each attack and can spend <font color='#404495'>(Sacred Orb)</font> stacks to get another cast of <font color='#404495'>(Spirit Combo)</font>.
skill.tips: The description of the passive speaks for itself. It has no cooldown and and stacks after every 2nd basic attack once the three orbs disappear. It does not deal a lot of damage but it is pretty decent to have before engaging an opponent and it allows you to kill jungle monsters quicker as well when you are farming.

item.tips: Learn S1 first at level 1 and level it up as soon as you can. Damage increases with each level and cool down decreases as well.

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Haas' Claws
des: Unique Passive - Insanity: Gains 15% extra Physical Lifesteal when below 50% HP.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
Rose Gold Meteor - good first item especially if you have mages as opponents. It gives 60 P.Attack, 30 Magic Resist and 5% Lifesteal along with a passive that grants you a shield when your HP drops to 30%.
Swift Boots - additional 15% attack speed. Having this early will enable you to farm jungle monsters faster and land more hits on an enemy whenever you initiate a fight. Getting some attack speed for Freya is good since it coincides with her 2nd skill.
Berserker's Fury - you'll need this item for more damage especially on squishy targets. It increases your crit chance by 25% and your crit damage by 40%. The passive of this item is also good.

besty.best_mate_tips: If she manages to land her ult on a bunch of enemy heroes piled up in one spot, Freya will be able to jump in freely without any hindrance, making the enemy team locked in consecutive crowd controls which will render them useless with no means of fighting back ensuring a successful team fight.
besty.name: Aurora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Fighters who don't have enough crowd control to win a 1v1 situation. Even if alucard has insane lifesteal, Freya is strong enough to kill him because she can dish as much damage while stunning him every few seconds.
counter.name: Alucard

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Freya relies heavily on her basic attacks to make the damage and Natalia's silence + smoke bomb if done correctly will make Freya unable to deal damage onto her.
countered_by.name: Natalia

skill.name: Mystic Projectile
skill.des: Gord conjures a Mystic Orb that bounces in the target direction and explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 270<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in the area and stunning them for 1s.
skill.tips: Skill 1 usahakan musuh terkena tepat dari lingkaran bola Gord karena ketika tepat musuh akan terkena Stun dan Damage lebih, selalu arahkan kemana musuh akan berada karena musuh juga akan selalu bergerak.

skill.name: Mystic Injunction
skill.des: Gord creates an energy field in the target area, dealing 55<font color='#27C0C7'>( +16% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> every 0.3s to enemies within (up to 13 times).
skill.tips: Gunakan skill ini selain untuk mencicil HP lawan juga bisa dengan cepat membuat Lane-mu bersih dari Creep lawan.

skill.name: Mystic Gush
skill.des:
Gord unleashes an energy beam in the target direction, dealing 135<font color='#27C0C7'>( +33% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies hit every 0.2s (up to 18 times).
The direction of the beam can be changed using the Left Joystick.
skill.tips: Berlatihlah agar Skill ini mengenai semua lawan, karena ketika War kita bisa menggunakannya untuk mencicil HP lawan atau juga membersihkan Lane. Namun gunakan dengan bijak dan ketika memang Skill harus di Cancel, maka kamu dapat meng-cancel Ulti dengan meng-klik Skill 3 lagi.

skill.name: Mystic Favor
skill.des: Enemies hit by Gord 4 times within a short period of time will take 140<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> and be slowed by 20% for 1s when hit by his attack again. The Slowing Effect can stack up to 2 times.
skill.tips: Selalu berlatih agar semua Skill dapat pas mengenai lawan, meskipun sulit namun Gord adalah Hero berbahaya yang dapat memberikan Damage terbesar pada musuh.

item.tips: Naikkan Skill 2 terlebih dahulu karena Skill 2 lebih mudah untuk membersihkan Lane dan Monster Jungle bila dikombinasikan dengan Skill Pasif Gord.

equip.name: Glowing Wand
des: Unique Passive - Scorch: Magic Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP per second, and increasing their Magic Damage taken by 2-4 (scales with level). Stacks up to 6 times.

equip.name: Demon Shoes
des: Unique Passive - Mysticism: Recovers 10% Max Mana on hero kills or assists and 4% on minion kills.

equip.name: Ice Queen Wand
des: Unique Passive - Ice Bound: Skills slow the target by 15% for 3s, capped at 2 stacks.

equip.name: Genius Wand
des: Unique Passive - Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3-7 (scales with level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

gear.tips:
Beli 1/2 Magic Necklace di awal game, lalu membeli :

- Magic Shoes
Selain menambah kecepatan pada hero juga mendapatkan Cooldown Reduction sebesar 10%.

- Enchanted Talisman
Cooldown sebesar 20% serta Magic Power, HP serta Regen 10% Mana setiap 10 detik.

- Holy Crystal
Memiliki Magic Power yang besar dan meningkatkan Magic Power di pasif uniknya.

- Glowing Wand
Menambahkan Magic Power, Magic Penetration serta Cooldown Reduction dan juga pasif uniknya menambahkan Magic Damage.

- Lighting Truncheon
Menambahkan Magic Power, Mana Regen, serta pasif uniknya yang membuat Damage Ulti Gord semakin besar.

- Immortality
Karena menambah Magic Resist dan juga HP yang besar serta membuat Gord hidup kembali dengan HP yang sedikit setelah mati.

besty.best_mate_tips: Ketika lawan sudah di-ulti oleh Grock kita dapat memberika damage yang besar pada lawan dengan ulti dari Gord.
besty.name: Grock

counter.restrain_hero_tips: kebanyakan Marksman lemah dan memiliki HP yang sangat sedikit, namun selalu jaga jarak dan usahakan agar tidak mengenai serangannya, sembunyi di semak-semak gunakan skill 1 pada Miya dan combo yang pas pada lawan.
counter.name: Miya

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Ulti Saber dapat menghentikan Ultimate Gord, diikuti dengan Combo Skill 1 dan 2 Saber yang dapat membunuh Gord atau memberikan Damage yang cukup besar pada Gord.
countered_by.name: Saber

skill.name: Claw Dash
skill.des:
Natalia dashes in the target direction, dealing 185<font color='#D58E1F'>( +40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in her path.
She can cast this skill again within 5s if an enemy is hit.
skill.tips: Claw Dash is a very easy skill to use. Natalia attacks ahead and causes damage, Natalia can also attack twice if the first attack hitting on a Hero. Thus, this skill is very useful for Natalia as additional mobility that can be used to chase opponents who run away and also to escape if the situation gets worse.

skill.name: Smoke Bomb
skill.des: Natalia releases <font color='#404495'>(Smoke Bomb)</font> on the spot, dodging all Basic Attacks and increasing Attack Speed by 25% while slowing the enemy by 40% for 4s.
skill.tips: Smoke Bomb is a special skill that will give her the Immune effect on all Basic Attack, which is certainly very effective especially against Marksman. Aside from being immune to Basic Attack, Natalia will also receive damage that is lower from Tower's attack, giving Natalia an additional strategy to crash into the Tower if needed.

skill.name: The Hunt
skill.des:
Natalia enters <font color='#404495'>(Assassin Instinct)</font> state, increasing Physical Attack by 15 for 3s.
This skill is charged every 30s for up to 2 stacks. Creep kills will immediately restore 50% Charging Time.
skill.tips: Natalia's Ultimate Skill is an Attack with a distance that is slightly larger than the Melee Range that attacks the opponent several times and slows down their Movement Speed. Among all Assassins, Natalia's Ultimate Skill is the weakest and is not a skill that can reverse the situation of the match, unlike Saber, Hayabusa, etc. However, this skill is still useful to slow down opponents who try to escape so that teammates can catch up with them.

skill.name: Assassin Instinct
skill.des:
If Natalia hides in the bush without dealing or receiving damage for 2s, she will conceal herself, increasing Movement Speed by 15% for up to 5s; but she will be noticed if she gets close to the enemy. In this state, Natalia's Basic Attack will teleport her to behind the target, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +130% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> while silencing the target for 0.25s.
Natalia's damage dealt from the target's back is increased by 115%. Her Basic Attacks against creeps always trigger this effect and deal 15% extra damage, but her Crit Damage is reduced to 140%.
skill.tips: Natalia's passive skill is the most powerful of all Hero Passive Skills in the Game, especially her ability to disappear and giving the Silence effect. Use the passive skill as often as possible to provide additional damage by attacking your opponent from behind and giving the Silence effect for 2 seconds. Finally, remember to always move places. Use additional speed and disappearance to put pressure on opponents in each Lane.

item.tips:
Although Claw Dash and Natalia's Ultimate Skill did not give a massive damage as much as the other Assassins (because Natalia relies more on Basic Attack), don't underestimate the Damage of these 2 Skills, because these two Skills are very good at securing opponents who want to escape.
To make it easier for Jungling and also taking the opponent's Jungle Monster, to prevent opponents from Jungling. Using Retribution when Stealth will not eliminate your Invisibility, which is why this is a very good way to get a Jungle Monster.

equip.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
des: Unique Passive - Ambush: If no damage is dealt to or taken from enemy heroes within 5s, the next Basic Attack deals 160 plus 40% Physical Attack as extra Physical Damage and slows the target by 40% for 1.5s.

equip.name: Ice Hunter's Rapid Boots
des: Unique Passive - Side Effect: Loses 25 Movement Speed for 5s upon dealing or taking damage.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Hunter Strike
des: Unique Passive - Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Windtalker
des: Unique Passive - Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can critically strike and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)

gear.tips: To increase physical damage during Jungling. More importantly, with the HP Regen that was obtained after killing Jungle Monster, it would make Natalia able to survive in the Lane and reduce Recall recurrence back into the Base.

besty.best_mate_tips: Saber and Chou can cause a Stun effect on the target or Cyclops which can lock the target to stay in position, then continue with Silencing for 2 seconds from Natalia, resulting in a deadly combo to hunt down opponents who don't suspect our presence.
besty.name: Saber

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Generally, Marksman is Natalia's main food, except for Miya who has the Ultimate Skill which works like Purify to neutralize the effects of Silence from Natalia. Likewise with Irithel who has an AoE Skill and a Basic Attack that will become AoE when the Ultimate Skill is active, this will easily show where Natalia is hiding.
counter.name: Clint

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Yi Sun-Shin's Ultimate Skill can notify Natalia’s whereabouts, not only eliminating her Invisibility at crucial times in Team Fight, but also continuously informing her teammates about Natalia's presence, so that the entire team gets information about the paths that are passed by Natalia.
countered_by.name: Yi Sun-shin

skill.name: Seimei Umbrella Open
skill.des: Kagura sends the <font color='#404495'>(Seimei Umbrella)</font> to the target location, dealing 315<font color='#27C0C7'>( +105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s. The Umbrella will automatically return to Kagura when she's too far away.
skill.tips:
It can act as an ward, throw the umbrella into a bush to reveal the location. This could reduce the chances of getting ganked.
There’s a built in slow whenever you hit, this CC annoys the hell out of your enemy. When escaping, keep throwing your umbrella towards your enemy to slow them down. This allows easier escape
To poke your enemy, it’s easier if your umbrella is out in the open, since it’s nearly unpredictable plus there’s a shorter distance to cover when compared to the umbrella flying out from you.
This ability allows you to poke people under their tower due to her insane range, remember point “2” under the passive section? Proc-ing the passive while under the the tower range allows you to take a hit from the tower, paired with the annoying range, it’s a pretty deadly combo.

skill.name: Rasho Umbrella Flee
skill.des: Kagura removes all debuffs on her and leaps in the target direction, while leaving the <font color='#404495'>(Seimei Umbrella)</font> behind.
skill.tips: Your bread and butter skill. The skill that makes her so annoying to deal with, with the built in purify. It makes her pretty much immune to all CCs. The one skill that allows her to slip away from chasing enemies when mastered.

skill.name: Yin Yang Overturn
skill.des: Kagura invokes the power of the <font color='#404495'>(Seimei Umbrella)</font>, dealing 330<font color='#27C0C7'>( +105% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.
skill.tips:
Use this skill with your “2” after teleporting to your umbrella proc “3” to deal some damage to the enemy and knocking them back.
This skill can be use to intercept enemies that are chasing your allies, the knockback and slow gives your allies some time to escape
You can even proc “3” before you dash away to escape
Teleporting behind your enemies and proc-ing “3” when they are near your tower can knock them towards your tower.

skill.name: Yin Yang Gathering
skill.des: Upon retrieving the <font color='#404495'>(Seimei Umbrella)</font>, Kagura gains a 280<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> shield, stuns nearby enemies for 0.5s, and slows them by 60% for 1s. Cooldown: 4.5s.
skill.tips:
One of your most important skills, this is what makes her an insane poking machine..
Reuniting with her umbrella would trigger the passive, which gives her a mini stun and a tiny shield.
There are 3 ways in reuniting with the umbrella that could trigger her passive.
Walking out of range from the umbrella
Using “2” to teleport to the umbrella
Walking over to the umbrella.

item.tips:
Kagura's damage must be prioritized. Her second skill is only teleport and escape, which can be used now once or later or maybe even not when not being grappled in the whole game. Her second skill is used once. Prioritize Seimei Umbrella Open and Yin Yang Overturn in order to maximize the damage can be dealt.
Flicker is another way to instantly teleport to a specified direction. Kagura can use Flicker in case her second skill is still on cooldown. And she can use this in various other ways.

equip.name: Clock of Destiny
des: Unique Passive - Time: Gains 20 extra Max HP and 4 extra Magic Power every 20s, capped at 15 stacks.

equip.name: Lightning Truncheon
des: Unique Passive - Resonate: Every 6s, the next skill deals 50-1000 extra Magic Damage (scales with Max Mana) to up to 3 enemies.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Divine Glaive
des: Unique Passive - Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

gear.tips:
Enchanted Talisman - 20% CDR is always a plus, what’s good about this item is the 10% regen in mana, this allows a better sustain in lane once the item is purchased, the additional HP is a bonus that will go well with Blood Wings.
After getting this item, clearing of Jungle and Minions wave is so much easier due to the Unique passive.
This Item goes well with your ult too, since it creates a huge link, anyone that’s within range would get rekt by the passive.

besty.best_mate_tips: Hayabusa is Kagura's childhood playmate, and they also make a good team. First attacker will be the assassin to slow the enemy down, then when Hayabusa casts his 3rd skill, Kagura can assist to deal damage to the enemy and end it.
besty.name: Hayabusa

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Kagura can deal an amount of Killing damage to Layla as she has low defense, unless Layla has balanced offense and defense gear set. Kagura can fastly kill Layla when doing her combo. But if Layla survives, she will deal large damage to Kagura and lifesteal.
counter.name: Layla

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Basically, Harley can counter Kagura because he can teleport then teleport back in his positions. Unlike Kagura that can only teleport once to her umbrella (because of the cooldown). But that does not mean Kagura cannot stand a chance against Harley. If Harley made his move first before Kagura, she will stagger and get low health before she can attack Harley. There are also cases that when Kagura threw her umbrella, Harley then used his 3rd Skill to Kagura, slowing her down and making her very vulnerable. Kagura can't use her 2nd Skill: Active 1 which is her jump that removes debuff when she doesn't have her umbrella. That's why be careful when fighting Harley.
countered_by.name: Harley

skill.name: Jeet Kune Do
skill.des:
Chou strikes in the target direction, dealing 180<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit. This skill can be cast 3 times before it goes on cooldown. On the 3rd cast, Chou also knocks enemies hit airborne.
Hitting an enemy hero with the 3rd cast resets the cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Shunpo)</font>.
skill.tips: Maximize the use of Jeet Kune Do (skill 1) since the beginning of the game. This is mainly because when we can use the skill 1 three times and cause Knock Up to the opponent in the palm of the hand area that hit the ground during the third hit.

skill.name: Shunpo
skill.des: Chou dashes in the target direction, gaining Control Immunity during the dash and 15 Physical Penetration and a 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> shield for 2s afterward.
skill.tips: With this 2nd skill, Chou can be immune from almost all the disabling skills of the opponent. But keep in mind that timings are the key to this skill.

skill.name: The Way of Dragon
skill.des:
Chou strikes a roundhouse kick at the target enemy hero, dealing them 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and knocking them back.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Chou launches a flurry of blows on the enemy in mid-air, dealing at least 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips:
Use Ultimate to kick your opponent towards your teammates.
This skill can also be used to kick your opponent away when you escape or save your teammates.
Tap quickly this skill 2 times to maximize the damage and getting the Knock Up effect.
Tap Skill 1 time when you run away or save a teammate.

skill.name: Only Fast
skill.des: After traveling 8 units, Chou deals 180% damage on his next Basic Attack (cannot critically strike) and briefly slows the target by 80%.
skill.tips: Chou's passive skill is used when Chou's hand has flared which indicates his passive ability is active so that it can produce 200% Basic attack.

item.tips:
Maximize the 1st Skill first, then upgrade the 2nd Skill, take the Ultimate Skill if it’s available.
Flicker is very useful both for chasing and throwing opponents with the 1st skill at the time of the third hit or also to escape if the 2nd skill is in Cooldown.
While Purification is very useful if there are many Crowd Control effects on the opposing team.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
Boots can be adapted to the composition that you encounter.
Then 2 items that have passive shields can strongly support Chou to last longer in a battle.
The Demon Advent can reduce the opponent's attack by 6% which lasts for 2 seconds and can be stacked for 3 times, so this equipment is very useful for team battles.
Bloodthirsty King: The uniqueness of this equipment is its passiveness which is every time Chou kills or helps (assists) Chou will get HP regeneration for 20% of Chou's HP. This will make Chou survive longer in the midst of team battles.
 Immortality is mandatory equipment especially in the Mid to Late Games because usually the opponent's attacks are getting stronger so there is a possibility for Chou to be more easily killed. With immortality, Chou can be resurrected and get 15% HP and a Shield that can absorb for 300-1000 attacks, so Chou could have enough time to escape or last longer in battle.

besty.best_mate_tips: Passive and Slow effects of Aurora makes it easier for Chou to reach an opponent or help to give a continuous Crowd Control effects after Chou kicks an enemy towards a teammate.
besty.name: Aurora

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Gord lacked mobility and was unable to move when using his Ultimate. Chou can freely Cancels Gord’s Ultimate.
counter.name: Gord

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Nana’s Skill can easily stop Chou's movement, while preventing Chou from approaching you or your teammates.
countered_by.name: Nana

skill.name: Endless Variety
skill.des:
Sun hurls his <font color='#404495'>(Golden Staff)</font> in the target direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy hero or creep or reaching the maximum range, the <font color='#404495'>(Golden Staff)</font> morphs into a Doppelganger that lasts 5s and inherits 40% of Sun's attributes (and a portion of his Attack Effects).
<font color='#404495'>(Endless Variety)</font> and <font color='#404495'>(Swift Exchange)</font> are learned and leveled up together and share the same cooldown.

skill.name: Instantaneous Move
skill.des: Sun commands his Doppelgangers to strike at the target enemy with him, dealing 170<font color='#D58E1F'>( +40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the enemy and those behind them.

skill.name: Simian God
skill.des: Attacks of Sun and his Doppelgangers reduce enemies' Physical Defense by 4% on hit (up to 10 stacks). Sun recovers HP by 50% of his Doppelganger's Physical Attack each time it deals damage.

skill.name: Swift Exchange
skill.des:
Sun hurls his <font color='#404495'>(Golden Staff)</font> in the target direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in its path.
He conjures a Doppelganger at his location that lasts 5s and inherits 40% of his attributes (and a portion of Attack Effects), conceals himself, and moves with the <font color='#404495'>(Golden Staff)</font>.
Sun reappears and retrieves the <font color='#404495'>(Golden Staff)</font> when it hits an enemy hero or reaches the maximum range.

equip.name: Corrosion Scythe
des: Unique Passive - Corrosion: Basic Attacks gain 80 extra Physical Damage and slow the target by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: Demon Hunter Sword
des: Unique Passive - Devour: Basic Attacks deal 9% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

skill.name: Rotary Impact
skill.des:
Alpha unleashes an energy wave in the target direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +90% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 40% for 1s.
Beta then strafes enemies along the same path, dealing 100<font color='#D58E1F'>( +90% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Gunakan skill ini pada musuh agar musuh terkena efek slow dan terkena damage juga.

skill.name: Force Swing
skill.des:
After a short delay, Alpha swings his blade in the target direction, dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and recovering 100<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> HP for each enemy hit.
Beta then strafes enemies in the same area, dealing 125<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Meskipun memang area skill ini kecil tapi jangan terlalu dekat dengan lawan, sebisa mungkin mundur kembali agar tidak terkena banyak damage dari lawan.

skill.name: Alpha, Charge!
skill.des:
Beta dives to the target location, dealing 100<font color='#D58E1F'>( +20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s. Alpha then leaps towards the same location, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in his path, knocking them airborne and to the landing location, and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s.
Beta then attacks the same area 5 times, dealing 25<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> each time.
skill.tips: Gunakan skill ini ke lawan dan cari posisi yang pas untuk melakukan Knock up pada lawan.

skill.name: Beta, Advance!
skill.des:
Beta assists Alpha on each skill cast, attacking and marking enemies hit. It launches 3 extra laser attacks on enemies marked 2 times.
The first two attacks deal 50<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> each and briefly slow the enemy hit, while the third deals 50<font color='#D58E1F'>( +130% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#E5CB19'>(True Damage)</font> to the enemy and those around them.
skill.tips: Beta akan membantu menyerang musuh jadi jangan terlalu sering dekat dengan musuh agar HP Anda tetap terjaga.

item.tips: Max kan dulu Skill 1, Skill 2 baru Skill 3. Utamakan skill 1 terlebih dahulu agar lawan bisa mendapatkan efek slow dari Alpha.

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Queen's Wings
des: Unique Passive - Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 20% Damage Reduction and 35% extra Spell Vamp for 5s (60s cooldown).

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
a. Boots of Tranquility

Menambahkan 20 HP Regen, 20 Mana Regen, 40 Movement SPD dan meningkatkan 10% Regen HP.

b. Bloodlust Axe

Memberikan 70 Physical Attack dan 10% Cooldown Reduction serta 20% Lifesteal untuk Alpha.

c. Dominance Ice

Item ini menambahkan 500 Mana, 70 Armor, 5% Crit Chance Reduction serta Cooldown Reduction hingga 15% dan melemahkan kecepatan lawan sebesar 5% serta kecepatan serangannya sebesar 30% juga.

d. Blade of Despair

Menambahkan 170 Physical Attack +10% Attack Speed dan tambahan 10% kerusakan musuh di setiap serangan yang tidak normal (tenegun. mengetuk udara. diubah. dihentikan).

e. Endless Battle

Menambahkan 65 Physical Attack, 25 Magic Power, 50 HP, 300 Mana,
45% Movement SPD dan 15% Lifesteal.

f. Immortality

Item ini menambah 800 HP serta 40 Magic Res, dan item ini spesial karena dapat bangkit setelah Alpha mati setelah 2 detik kematian dan mendapatkan HP serta Shield yang menyerap 300~1000 Points dari serangan. Shield bertahan untuk 3 detik dan cooldown untuk efek ini 180 detik.

besty.best_mate_tips: Ketika lawan terkena efek slow atau stun dari Alpha, Irithel dapat maju untuk memberikan banyak serangan pada lawan.
besty.name: Irithel

counter.restrain_hero_tips: Attack Speed dan Skill Zilong dapat mengalahkan Alpha dengan mudah. tetap berhati-hati dan lihat situasi apa Zilong musuh dapat benar-benar dikalahkan oleh Alpha Anda.
counter.name: Zilong

countered_by.by_restrain_tips: Kekurangan Alpha adalah kemampuan untuk mendekati lawan, Layla memiliki jarak serangan yang sangat jauh sehingga dapat dengan mudah melakukan Free Hit pada Alpha.
countered_by.name: Layla

skill.name: Be good!
skill.des: Ruby swings her scythe, dealing 80<font color='#D58E1F'>( +65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in an arc. She then releases a shockwave in the same direction that deals 80<font color='#D58E1F'>( +65% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slows them by 40% for 2s.
skill.tips: S1 Slashed in frontal direction and dealing a 75 PHYSICAL DAMAGE to enemies and slowing their movement.It does not really give a high damage to enemies and it does not hurt all all for tanks in early game maybe but it quite useful a bit to clear up lanes helping your minions and harrasing your enemies a little.But if you happen to be countering a ranged attack heroes in early games its good enough for you to stay out of their hotspot or area of attack..it won't cost much of mana if you use it wisely..But when you Lifesteal Gear is finished,it might be as well as healing stuff if you have the lifesteal.

skill.name: Don't run, Wolf King!
skill.des: Ruby swings her scythe around herself twice, each swing dealing 60<font color='#D58E1F'>( +55% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5s, and slowly pulling them toward her.
skill.tips: Second skill is come in handy in Many..Many ways.When the skill is triggered,she will attack twice and stunning the enemies for at least 0.5 second at first level and slowly pulling them towards her and it deals additionals 30% damage when the enemy at outer ring.For the new players,This skill can stop any swift assassin as long as you caught the great timing.You might be able to pursuit enemy and slowing them down for your allies to catch up.

skill.name: I'm offended!
skill.des: Ruby sweeps her scythe in the target direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit, pulling them toward her, and stunning them for 0.5s.
skill.tips: Her third skill can pull all of enemies in front.I'M OFFENDED.When triggered she able to attack horizontally in a Wide Range.Dealing 205 pts of Physical Damage at first level and able to pulling them towards hero positions plus stunning them for 0.5 secs at first level.Its quite similar to Franco's hook but this one is a little short but able to be pulling all enemy in the area of attack.

skill.name: Let's dance!
skill.des:
Ruby has 10% initial Physical Lifesteal. Her skills benefit from 115% of her Physical Lifesteal, while her Basic Attacks cannot trigger Lifesteal.
After each skill cast, Ruby can dash to another location, gaining 9 (+1.8*Hero Level) Physical & Magic Defense (scales with level, up to 3 stacks) for 4s.
skill.tips: It can pass through base walls for real..as long as the walls is not too thickother than that is useless so use it wisely if you're in Pursuit or Escaping saw a wall.Just cast your skill nearby walls and just move foward because when you use a flicker you might be dead twice before you can use it again.

item.tips:
Max S1 first. Deals considerable damage.
You can combine Flicker with your ult.Use it to chase a low-hp enemy; or to escape

equip.name: Haas' Claws
des: Unique Passive - Insanity: Gains 15% extra Physical Lifesteal when below 50% HP.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

gear.tips:
Lifesteal and a mix of armor and magic resistance, with CDR. It'll attach the passive, so you'll know why I build Haas' Claws and Bloodbath Axe first (you can build defense before the Axe, though, depending on how the match is going).
Immortality importance: as she can tank a lot, even after resurrection she can keep fighting or escape easily with another characteristic of her skill: jumping after casting skills.

besty.best_mate_tips: Ruby ults and stuns, while Lapu ults and bursts.
besty.name: Lapu-Lapu

counter.restrain_hero_tips: You can cancel his 3rd skill with your 2nd skill or Ult (Gets canceled with any stun). Also, you can interrupt his 2nd skill when he finishes the first charge with your 2nd skill and jump away
counter.name: Tigreal

skill.name: Traceless
skill.des: Yi Sun-shin slashes forward with his glaive, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +40% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. He becomes immune to CC while dashing for 1s.
skill.tips:
Your ESCAPE tool, use it wisely
Decent slow, for escaping or chasing
Turtleship would replace this skill so take note, You’ll be flying back like a normal “1” however there will be a straight line skillshot to stun the enemy.

skill.name: Blood Floods
skill.des:
<font color='#404495'>(Tap)</font>: Yi Sun-shin slashes swiftly with his glaive, dealing 240<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
 <font color='#404495'>(Charge)</font>: Yi Sun-shin shoots forward a powerful arrow, dealing 240<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the target. The arrow's damage scales with the charge time, up to 200%. This damage decays with the number of enemies hit but can't go below 40%. His Movement Speed is reduced by 20% while charging the skill.
Yi Sun-shin gains <font color='#404495'>(Weapon Mastery)</font> immediately upon skill cast.
skill.tips:
Your main harassing skill.
One of the hardest hitting skill
Range and damage increases when you charge your attack, make sure you have it charged fully for maximum damage
Movement while charging is possible, however it’s a little slow

skill.name: Mountain Shocker
skill.des:
<font color='#404495'>(Passive)</font>: Increases the damage of <font color='#404495'>(Heavenly Vow)</font> by 10%/5%.
<font color='#404495'>(Active)</font>: Yi Sun-shin commands the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of precise cannon attacks to all enemy heroes. Each wave deals 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>. (When a target is hit by multiple waves, a maximum of 150% damage will be dealt.)
skill.tips:
That being said, it’s not impossible to avoid this ult, try to save this when your team is engaging in a team fight or you need to know the location of your enemies.
Please don’t use this immediately once it’s off CD, it has one of the longest CD in the game and the mana consumption is crazy
When playing with friends, you can let your friend tell you when a teamfight is about to start or is happening for you to deal more residual damage. If SoloQ-ing, please keep an eye on the minimap to know when a fight is starting.

skill.name: Heavenly Vow
skill.des:
Yi Sun-shin chooses his <font color='#404495'>(longbow)</font> or <font color='#404495'>(glaive)</font> to attack according to his distance from the target.
<font color='#404495'>(Weapon Mastery)</font>: After each weapon swap, the next two attacks will be enhanced. The first attack deals 70%-100% Crit Damage. The second attack deals 55%-70% Crit Damage. Each enhanced attack grants 20% Movement Speed for 1s and reduces the cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Traceless)</font> by 1s.
The allied base is transformed into a naval fleet. Every 180s or after respawn, a <font color='#404495'>(Turtle Ship)</font> is spawned at the allied base. Yi Sun-shin can board the Turtle Ship and gains 60% Movement Speed that will decay to <%Num11> after <Num10>s and enhances <font color='#404495'>(Traceless)</font>.
skill.tips:
If possible always use your Glaive (Sword) to attack, the damage output from it is higher
Every 3 minutes a Turtleship will appear at the base, head over to collect it
Turtleship gives a movement speed buff and turns your “1” into a straight line skillshot that stuns the enemy when hit.
Has an innate slow passive, best used for chasing enemies or slowing them down when running, try to hit them as much as possible.

item.tips:
Max “2” first, for more damage.
Retribution - This allows easier farming and stealing enemies jungle creep if needed.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Flame Hunter's Magic Shoes

equip.name: Berserker's Fury
des: Unique Passive - Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips:
The play style of this build is much like any other Marksman where you focus on doing more damage using your Auto Attack.
Scarlet Phantom - One of the core items for Marksman, This item gives you enough super high Attack Speed and Enough Critical Chance to deal lots of damage. It’s pretty much one of the best item for any Marksman.
Haas’s Claws - Another core item, This item gives you regen from your Auto Attack, this item could save your ass. It has one of the better lifesteal stats in game.

skill.name: Abyss Walker
skill.des: Moskov teleports to the target location, increasing his Attack Speed to 1.15 times for 3s. Meanwhile, his Basic Attack deals 10% more damage to enemies behind the primary target.
skill.tips: when using this on Initiating an attack constalnly use this to reposition yourself, since its very vital for moskov to change his angle for better damage output by taking advantage his passive and on his other abilities, this will give you higher survivability specially on team clash where he needs to be at the back and give him a good space to launch his attacks.

skill.name: Spear of Misery
skill.des:
Moskov launches a powerful strike at the target enemy hero or creep, dealing them 300<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, knocking them back, and exposing their position for 5s.
If the enemy collides with an enemy hero when knocked back, they'll both take 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and be stunned for 1.5s. If the enemy is knocked into a wall, they'll be stunned for 1.5s.
skill.tips: You can also use this skill to push enemy away from to their tower, just use your first skill to teleport at the back on your enemy and then use your second skill to push him away from the tower,  just be aware that this act is very dangerous since you will get closer to the tower.

skill.name: Spear of Destruction
skill.des: After a short delay, Moskov throws out the Spear of Destruction in the target direction, dealing 600<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in a line and to the first enemy hero hit. Upon hitting an enemy hero, the Spear explodes and deals 780<font color='#D58E1F'>( +130% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies behind them. The enemy hero and enemies hit by the explosion are slowed by 50% for 1s. The slow duration scales with the flying distance (up to 5s).
skill.tips: Keep an eye on the minimap and check if there's a clash just be aware if there is an enemy with a low health you can easily finish him off by using this ability, you can use this by mannual targeting you will see an indicator or marking which you will see it on the minimap this will greatly help you to estimate and use this ability.

skill.name: Spear of Quiescence
skill.des: Moskov's Basic Attacks can penetrate the target and deal <font color='#D58E1F'>( +68% Total Physical Attack)</font>-<font color='#D58E1F'>( +110% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies behind them (inherits Attack Effects). Each Basic Attack hit reduces the cooldowns of <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Walker)</font> and <font color='#404495'>(Spear of Misery)</font> by 0.8s.
skill.tips: On a team clash always keep an eye where enemy heroes will be closer to each other or they align on a perpendicular manner, this will give more advantage for you since you can take hits on them and share the damage.

item.tips:
Max S1 ,then S2.
For Moskov since his very squishy recommend for Flicker or Sprint for mobility good for additional scaping and chasing capabilities.

skill.name: Deadly Pincers
skill.des: Johnson throws his spanner toward the target location, dealing 120<font color='#47BE34'>( +250% Total Physical Defense)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path. Enemies around the landing point are stunned for 0.8s.

skill.name: Electromag Rays
skill.des:
Johnson raises his shield, continuously dealing 80<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area in the target direction and slowing them by 20%. Each instance of damage also increases the enemy's subsequent damage taken from the skill by 15% (up to 45%). This damage is increased by 60% against creeps.
Johnson can cast Basic Attacks and skills for the duration.
skill.tips: As you can continue using basic attacks while this skill is active, you can use basic attacks to adjust this skill's direction, and thus greatly increase its hit rate.

skill.name: Rapid Touchdown
skill.des:
Johnson transforms into a car, accelerating over time. An allied hero can board the car during the acceleration phase. The car will explode upon hitting an enemy hero or obstacle, dealing 300<font color='#27C0C7'>( +160% Total Magic Power)</font>-450<font color='#27C0C7'>( +280% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies, stunning them for 0.5-1s (scales with the car's speed), and creating an electrified zone at the location. Enemies in the zone are continuously dealt 60<font color='#27C0C7'>( +20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slowed. Johnson can cast <font color='#404495'>(Throttle)</font> to skip the acceleration phase, <font color='#404495'>(Brake)</font> to stop immediately, and hold <font color='#404495'>(Nitrous)</font> to continuously increase his speed for up to 5s. Johnson's location is revealed for 3s upon casting this skill.
<font color='#404495'>(Passive)</font>: Johnson's Physical Defense is increased by 10%.
skill.tips: Take full advantage of Johnson's car form to gank often. You can also carry a teammate with you to steal the enemy's base.

skill.name: Electro-airbag
skill.des: When Johnson's HP drops below 30%, he gains a 300<font color='#47BE34'>( +700% Total Physical Defense)</font> shield for 10s. Cooldown: 100s.

item.tips:
Max 2nd Skill.
Petrify - Can be combined with your 1st skill and ultimate to carry out a deadly combo.

des: Unique Passive - Bladed Armor: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 20% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus 20% of the hero's Physical Defense to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.

equip.name: Athena's Shield
des: Unique Passive - Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, gains 25% Magic Damage Reduction for 3s (applied before taking damage). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

gear.tips:
Tank Build
This equipment set is extremely tanky. While Electromag Rays is active, Cursed Helmet's passive effect will also continuously reduce the enemy's HP, resulting in significant overall damage. Along with Oracle's HP regeneration effects and Blade Armor's counterattack mechanism, you'll have the advantage in most skirmishes.

skill.name: Stardust Shock
skill.des: Cyclops casts two Stardust Disks in the target direction, each dealing 275<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path.
skill.tips:
Use his first skill on creeps. This skill is mostly used for killing creeps/minions and killing running enemies.
Cyclops will shoot out planets to the specified target dealing the target 210 magic pts at the start.
Using this skill while clashing with enemies will reduce all skill cooldown allowing you to use your second skill faster as well as trapping running enemies with your ultimate.

skill.name: Planets Attack
skill.des: Cyclops conjures Starlit Spheres around himself while gaining 30% extra Movement Speed for 2s. The Spheres will automatically seek and attack nearby enemies (prioritizes enemy heroes), exploding on collision and dealing 200<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the enemy. Enemies hit by multiple Spheres take reduced damage after the first hit.
skill.tips:
This is the most powerful skill Cyclops has. Planets will start to surround Cyclops making nearby enemies target and dealing 210 damage pts each planet.
This is mostly used for finishing off enemies and damaging them. This is also used to and commonly used to stop/trap enemies from running away.

skill.name: Star Power Lockdown
skill.des: Cyclops creates a Planetary Sphere and sends it after the target enemy hero or creep, dealing them 550<font color='#27C0C7'>( +220% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and immobilizing them for 1-2s (scales with flying distance).
skill.tips:
As said in the first skill this is used to trap running enemies or just enemies.
Allowing you or your teammate to kill your enemy or simply finish them off if they have a low amount of health for this skill will follow wherever the enemy goes.
This can be countered by many heroes now so don't be too shabby while in a match.

skill.name: Starlit Hourglass
skill.des: Each time Cyclops hits an enemy with his skills, all his skill cooldowns are reduced by 0.5s.
skill.tips:
His passive allows all his skills to reduce 0.5 seconds upon hitting an enemy.
This passive is really strong and a cooldown+magic damage build will make Cyclops really Over Powered.

item.tips:
Max your second skill (Planets Attack) first, then your first skill, upgrade your ultimate when possible.
You should max your second skill first as this is Cyclops most powerful skill.
You can easily kill your enemies/finish them off with the appropriate build with his 2nd. So max his second first.
This is essential when you have low health, you can easily escape from the enemy when you use this.
This is also essential when you are chasing enemies. You should use this because Cyclops can be very fragile without the 3rd Item.
