skill.name: Abyss Impact
skill.des:
Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +170% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, slowing the enemies by 30% for 1.2s, and applying 1 stack of <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Mark)</font>.
As the shock wave travels, for each enemy it hits, it deals an extra 10% damage, inflicts extra 5% Slowing Effect, and applies an additional stack of <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Mark)</font>, capped at 130% damage, 45% Slowing Effect, and 4 stacks. This skill deals only 80% damage to minions.
skill.tips: Brody launches a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing damage to and slowing down the enemies hit while leaving an "Abyss Mark" on them. For every extra enemy hit, "Abyss Impact" inflicts extra damage and slow effect on enemies as well as applying additional stacks of "Abyss Mark" to them.

skill.name: Corrosive Strike
skill.des:
Brody dashes to an enemy, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the target, stunning the target for 0.8s, and inflicting 1 stack of <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Mark)</font> on the target.
Upon hitting the target, he is able to move one more time in the movement direction, gaining 45% Movement Speed that will decay rapidly in 1.2s.
skill.tips: Brody dashes to and stuns the target enemy. After which he dashes one more time in the chosen direction and gains extra Movement Speed.

skill.name: Torn-Apart Memory
skill.des: Brody locks on all the targets within 8 yard(s), dealing 340<font color='#D58E1F'>( +180% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to them. If the target has an <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Mark)</font>, all <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Marks)</font> will be reset, dealing <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> equal to 136<font color='#D58E1F'>( +72% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 4% of the target's lost HP for each stack the target has.
skill.tips: Brody locks onto the enemy targets in range, dealing damage to them according to their lost HP and the stacks of "Abyss Mark" on them.

skill.name: Abyss Corrosion
skill.des:
With his Basic Attacks resonated with the Abyss Power within his body, Brody is able to move while winding up his Basic Attacks (which will be interrupted when casting skills), at the cost of having longer Basic Attack Animation and lower Attack Speed Bonus. Each Basic Attack deals <font color='#D58E1F'>( +140% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#E5CB19'>((+45*Hero Level))</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> (of which the damage scaling with level cannot be critical), increases Movement Speed by 30% (which will decay rapidly in 1.2s), and inflicts 1 stack of <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Mark)</font> on the enemy, capped at 4 stacks.
Each stack of <font color='#404495'>(Abyss Mark)</font> increases Brody's damage against the target by 5% and his Movement Speed by 5%.
skill.tips: Brody has a relatively slow Attack Speed. However, each of his Basic Attack inflicts a remarkable amount of damage on the enemy as well as applying the "Abyss Mark" and slow effect to them.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips: Since Brody is not a traditional marksman, we highly recommend this build as it further boosts Brody's damage output as well as buying him more chances to overwhelm his opponents.

skill.name: Void Blast
skill.des:
Yve detonates <font color='#404495'>(Galactic Energy)</font> at the target location, dealing 200<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in the area and 145<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> extra <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to those in the center.
Successfully hitting an enemy grants Yve 55% extra Movement Speed (halved if a non-hero enemy is hit) that decays over 1s.
If an enemy hero is hit in the center of the area, the cooldown of this skill is reduced by 0.5s.
skill.tips: This is Yve's main damage dealing skill, which requires a relatively high hit rate to deal more extra damage to targets within the central area. Try to cast the skill with the target at the center of the skill range.

skill.name: Void Crystal
skill.des:
Yve summons a <font color='#404495'>(Void Crystal)</font> at the target location, dealing 220<font color='#27C0C7'>( +40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Yve commands the Crystal to fire materialized energy in the target direction for 2.7s, dealing 90<font color='#27C0C7'>( +20% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> every 0.45s to enemies hit and slowing them by 25%. Enemies hit multiple times are slowed by an extra 10% for each hit after the first (up to 75%).
skill.tips: This skill enables Yve to block paths when chasing enemies or being chased. Besides, it can slow targets down so that Yve can aim Void Blast more accurately to improve damage output.

skill.name: Real World Manipulation
skill.des:
Yve creates a Starfield that lasts 15s and gains a 400<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> Shield. Within the duration, you can Tap or Swipe the screen to attack up to 15 times.
<font color='#404495'>(Tap)</font>: Deals 340<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in the target area.
<font color='#404495'>(Swipe)</font>: Deals 65<font color='#27C0C7'>( +10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> every 0.45s to enemies in the target area for 2.7s and slows them by 75%.
Enemies leaving or entering the Starfield will be immobilized for 0.8s (only once against the same target).
Yve cannot be displaced while the Starfield is active, and the Starfield will remain even if Yve is controlled (except for Suppression).
skill.tips: This is Yve's core skill, which greatly enhances her teamfight ability. She can take control of the pace of a battle from a safe distance and deal high damage.

skill.name: Galactic Power
skill.des:
Yve gains a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Galactic Power)</font> each time she hits an enemy hero with <font color='#404495'>(Void Blast)</font> or <font color='#404495'>(Void Crystal)</font> (up to 10 stacks).
Each stack of <font color='#404495'>(Galactic Power)</font> allows Yve to launch an extra attack on the next <font color='#404495'>(Real World Manipulation)</font> cast and increases the amount of shield gained by 5%.
skill.tips: With Passive, Yve can poke enemies during the laning phase to gain stacks, so as to gain more casts of her Ultimate.

equip.name: Ice Queen Wand
des: Unique Passive - Ice Bound: Skills slow the target by 15% for 3s, capped at 2 stacks.

equip.name: Demon Shoes
des: Unique Passive - Mysticism: Recovers 10% Max Mana on hero kills or assists and 4% on minion kills.

equip.name: Glowing Wand
des: Unique Passive - Scorch: Magic Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP per second, and increasing their Magic Damage taken by 2-4 (scales with level). Stacks up to 6 times.

equip.name: Genius Wand
des: Unique Passive - Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3-7 (scales with level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

gear.tips: This set of equipment items is recommended. Since Yve is a Mage with high and continuous damage output, it would be better for her to use equipment that can enhance damage dealing.

skill.name: Soul Bloom
skill.des:
Mathilda resonates with the power of her ancestors for 3.5s, attracting wisps as her movement distance increases (up to 6 wisps).
At the end of the duration, or when Mathilda casts this skill again, the wisps will seek and attack nearby enemies, each dealing 350<font color='#27C0C7'>( +100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and revealing the enemies' positions briefly. The damage of successive wisp hits on the same enemy will decay to 20%.
skill.tips: Mathilda resonates with the power of ancestors and summons wisps that surround her. With the movement distance increased, more and more wisps will be attracted to her, capped at 6 wisps. After casting this skill or reaching the time limit, the power of ancestors will guide the wisps to attack nearby enemies and deal Damage.

skill.name: Guiding Wind
skill.des:
Mathilda leaps in the target direction and creates a field around her, gaining a 500<font color='#27C0C7'>( +180% Total Magic Power)</font> shield and 25% extra Movement Speed for 3s. Allied heroes who come into contact with the field will receive a 60% shield and <font color='#404495'>(Guiding Wind)</font>. The first allied hero that triggers <font color='#404495'>(Guiding Wind)</font> will be guided to Mathilda, and both of them will gain the same Movement Speed boost.
When casting this skill during <font color='#404495'>(Circling Eagle)</font>, Mathilda won't change her position.
<font color='#404495'>(Guiding Wind)</font> expires 2s after the hero leaves Mathilda's field.
skill.tips: Mathilda creates a field surrounding her and leaps forward. Upon landing, she gains a Shield and Movement Speed. The allied units who come in contact with this field will receive the same Shield also, and Guiding Wind: After using Guiding Wind, the hero will be guided to Mathilda, and both of them will gain the same Movement Speed. When using this skill during Circling Eagle, Mathilda will not change her position.

skill.name: Circling Eagle
skill.des:
Mathilda applies a Soul Mark to the target enemy hero and circles around them for up to 2s, during which wisps will rush toward nearby enemies, each dealing 60<font color='#27C0C7'>( +15% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>. <font color='#404495'>(Soul Bloom)</font> will prioritize targets with Soul Mark.
At the end of the duration, or when Mathilda casts this skill again, she'll charge at the enemy, dealing 320<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in her path while knocking them back and stunning them for 0.4s.
Mathilda gains Control Immunity and a 600<font color='#27C0C7'>( +160% Total Magic Power)</font> shield for the skill duration.
skill.tips: Mathilda applies a Soul Mark to the targeted hero and then circles around the target for a while. During this period, wisps will rush to nearby enemies, each time dealing Magic Damage. After casting this skill or reaching the time limit, she will rush to the target, knocking back enemies on the path and stunning them. Mathilda gains control immunity and Shield during her circling.

skill.name: Ancestral Guidance
skill.des: Mathilda gains <font color='#404495'>(Ancestral Guidance)</font> while moving. When it's fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the target and granting her 80 extra Movement Speed that decays over 2.5s.
skill.tips: Mathilda gains Ancestral Guidance while moving. When it is fully charged, her next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing extra Damage to the target and increasing her Movement Speed.

equip.name: Enchanted Talisman
des: Unique Passive - Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.

equip.name: Arcane Boots - Favor
des: Unique Passive - Passive - Favor: Success

equip.name: Necklace of Durance
des: Unique Passive - Gift: Regenerates 20% Max HP and Mana over 2s after leveling up.

equip.name: Glowing Wand
des: Unique Passive - Scorch: Magic Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP per second, and increasing their Magic Damage taken by 2-4 (scales with level). Stacks up to 6 times.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

gear.tips: In terms of equipment items, this kit is recommended for Mathilda as a support hero, which boosts her damage, survivability and ability to assist.

skill.name: Heavy Left Punch
skill.des:
Paquito throws a punch in the target direction, dealing 210<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit. He gains a 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +110% Total Physical Attack)</font> shield for 2.5s if an enemy hero is hit.
<font color='#404495'>(Champ Stance)</font>: The damage is increased to 350<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>, while the shield value is increased to 140%. The regular and enhanced shields can stack.
skill.tips: Paquito dashes forth and throws a jab, dealing Physical Damage to all enemies within area of effect. [Champ Stance] Enhanced: Gives Paquito's jab even more striking force, dealing Physical Damage to enemies within area of effect.

skill.name: Jab
skill.des:
Paquito dashes in the target direction and throws a jab, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +165% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit. Paquito deals no damage to enemies in his path but will stop and throw the jab early upon colliding with an enemy hero or creep.
<font color='#404495'>(Champ Stance)</font>: The damage is increased to 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +230% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Paquito launches an elbow strike to all enemies in front, dealing Physical Damage and pushing them to the destination. He then swings a haymaker at rapid speed, dealing Physical Damage and slowing targets, as he darts backward. [Champ Stance] Enhanced: Having pushed enemies to the destination, Paquito launches a uppercut, dealing Physical Damage and knocking his enemies airborne instead of slowing them.

skill.name: Knockout Strike
skill.des:
Paquito launches an elbow strike in the target direction, dealing 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and knocking them back. He then throws a haymaker, dealing 300<font color='#D58E1F'>( +90% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 75% for 1s, as he darts backward.
<font color='#404495'>(Champ Stance)</font>: Instead of a haymaker, Paquito launches an uppercut after the elbow strike, dealing 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +120% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and knocking them airborne for 0.5s.
skill.tips: Paquito builds stacks when hitting enemy heroes with Basic Attacks or dealing damage with skills. Once this stack reaches 4, he enters [Champ Stance] and enhances his next skill. Paquito excels in his technique, and once empowered his skills have no cooldown. However, each of his Basic Attacks only deals Physical Damage. After using any enhanced skill, Paquito increases his Movement Speed.

skill.name: Champ Stance
skill.des:
After every 3 skill casts, Paquito enters the <font color='#404495'>(Champ Stance)</font>, gaining an enhanced skill ignoring his current cooldowns. He gains 60% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.8s after casting the enhanced skill.
Paquito's Basic Attacks only deal <font color='#D58E1F'>( +85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Paquito punches in a specified direction, dealing Physical Damage to the target hit. If a hero is hit, Paquito gains Shield. [Champ Stance] Enhanced: Paquito's heavy punch becomes even fiercer, dealing Physical Damage and granting him Shield (this enhanced shield can stack with the non-enhanced shield, too).

skill.name: Slam, Slam
skill.des:
Gloo reaches out and slams the ground, dealing 100<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the enemy.
At the final location, a <font color='#404495'>(Goo)</font> is left behind that explodes after 3s to deal 200<font color='#47BE34'>( +8% Total HP)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and immobilize them for 1s. If Gloo touches the <font color='#404495'>(Goo)</font>, it will explode immediately, reset the skill's CD, and heal Gloo for 3% of Max HP.

skill.name: Pass, Pass
skill.des:
Gloo stretches forth to deal 100<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path, immobilizing them for 0.5s.
If this skill hits a <font color='#404495'>(Goo)</font>, Gloo will charge over to it, dragging enemies in its path in the same direction for a distance.

skill.name: Split, Split
skill.des:
Gloo splits into Goos for 10s, during which it gains 35% extra Movement Speed, recovers 1.5% Max HP per second, and deals 120<font color='#27C0C7'>( +25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> every 0.25s to enemies it comes into contact with.
<font color='#404495'>(Grab, Grab)</font>: Gloo attaches itself to the target enemy hero with max <font color='#404495'>(Sticky)</font> stacks for up to 9s, recovering 25% Max HP. For the duration, Gloo transfers 80% of the damage he receives (calculated before damage reduction; excluding damage from turrets) to its host, and its Basic Attacks deal 120<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>.
<font color='#404495'>(Go, Go)</font>: Gloo leaves its host early.
Cooldown is lowered to 5s if the host dies while Gloo is still attached to it.

skill.name: Stick, Stick
skill.des:
Enemies gain a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Sticky)</font> each time they're hit by Gloo's skills, decreasing their Movement Speed by 6% for 6s. Stacks up to 5.
Each stack of <font color='#404495'>(Sticky)</font> on an enemy reduces their damage dealt to Gloo by 8%.

equip.name: Cursed Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: Deals Magic Damage equal to 0.8% of the hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 210% to 350% against creeps and minions (scales with level).

equip.name: Tough Boots - Dire Hit

equip.name: Haas' Claws
des: Unique Passive - Insanity: Gains 15% extra Physical Lifesteal when below 50% HP.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Demon Hunter Sword
des: Unique Passive - Devour: Basic Attacks deal 9% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

equip.name: Rose Gold Meteor
des: Unique Passive - Lifeline: When HP is about to drop below 30%, gains a 280-700 shield (scales with level) and 12 extra Magic Defense for 3s (40s cooldown).

skill.name: Malefic Terror
skill.des:
Phoveus smashes the ground and unleashes <font color='#404495'>(Astaros Dread)</font>, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>( +100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the target.
Upon hitting an enemy hero, Phoveus receives a 0<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#47BE34'>(+6% Total HP)</font> Shield as well as a 25% Movement Speed boost for 3s.
If an enemy hero, creep or Phoveus himself touches Astaros Dread, it will spread and deal extra damage (successive damage dealt to the same enemy decays to 25%).
This skill gains 1 charge every 8.5s, up to 3 charges, and deals 160% damage to minions.

skill.name: Astaros Eye
skill.des:
Phoveus summons forth <font color='#404495'>(Astaros Eye)</font> in a targeted area that deals 100<font color='#27C0C7'>( +20% Total Magic Power)</font> damage.
After 1s, <font color='#404495'>(Astaros Eye)</font> starts shrinking and pulling all enemies on it into its center, dealing 250<font color='#27C0C7'>( +70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>.

skill.name: Demonic Force
skill.des:
<font color='#404495'>(Astaros)</font> keeps a watchful gaze over an area of 8 yards around Phoveus. If it sees an enemy hero using blink or charge skills, it will be activated and cast a Mark upon them for 3s. During this time, Phoveus can rapidly blink to their location to deliver a fierce blow, dealing 600<font color='#27C0C7'>( +180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the target and its vicinity and gaining a 160<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#47BE34'>(+5% Total HP)</font> Shield.
Once Phoveus activates this effect, this skill can be cast repeatedly at the cost of Mana for up to 12s before entering cooldown, as long as the required conditions are met.

skill.name: Demonic Intuition
skill.des: Phoveus' weapon, <font color='#404495'>(Astaros)</font>, holds mysterious powers and is exceptionally sensitive to fast-moving prey. When an enemy hero uses Blink or Charge skills within 8 yards of Astaros, it reduces all of Phoveus' skill cooldowns or charge times by 1s.

equip.name: Clock of Destiny
des: Unique Passive - Time: Gains 20 extra Max HP and 4 extra Magic Power every 20s, capped at 15 stacks.

equip.name: Tough Boots
des: Unique Passive - Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%

equip.name: Concentrated Energy
des: Unique Passive - Recharge: Recovers 10% Max HP on hero kills.

equip.name: Athena's Shield
des: Unique Passive - Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, gains 25% Magic Damage Reduction for 3s (applied before taking damage). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

skill.name: Superposition
skill.des: Natan shoots a dense mass of energy in the target direction, dealing 225<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+140% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path.

skill.name: Interference!
skill.des:
Natan launches a Gravitational Attractor in the target direction, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in its path and knocking them back.
The Attractor detonates upon reaching the maximum range, dealing 30<font color='#D58E1F'>( +10% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+14% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and knocking them back.

skill.name: Entropy?
skill.des:
Natan summons a <font color='#404495'>(Reverse-Clone)</font> at a target location 6 units away that lasts 10s, inherits 35% of his attack attributes (and a portion of Attack Effects), and will copy his moves and attacks in reverse.
<font color='#404495'>(Use Again)</font>: Natan switches places with the <font color='#404495'>(Reverse-Clone)</font>.
Each cast reduces other skills' remaining cooldowns by 50%. The <font color='#404495'>(Reverse-Clone)</font> will disappear if Natan is too far away, while the cooldown of this skill will be reduced by the remaining duration.

skill.name: Theory of Everything
skill.des:
Natan gains a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Entanglement)</font> each time he or his <font color='#404495'>(Reverse-Clone)</font> hits an enemy with a skill (up to 6 stacks). Each stack lasts 5s and grants 7.5%-15% extra Attack Speed and 7.5% Movement Speed.
Natan's Basic Attack projectiles will return to Natan after reaching the maximum range, dealing an extra 45<font color='#D58E1F'>( +50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+70% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies along the way (inherits a portion of Attack Effects).
Natan's knowledge of magic and technology allows him to convert 100% of his Physical Lifesteal to Magic Lifesteal.

equip.name: Feather of Heaven
des: Unique Passive - Affliction: Basic Attacks deal extra Magic Damage equal to 50 plus 30% of the hero's Magic Power.

equip.name: Golden Staff
des: Unique Passive - Swift: Every 1% extra Crit Chance gained is converted into 1% extra Attack Speed.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Concentrated Energy
des: Unique Passive - Recharge: Recovers 10% Max HP on hero kills.

equip.name: Divine Glaive
des: Unique Passive - Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

skill.name: Aulus, Charge!
skill.des: Aulus removes all Slowing Effects and gains 30% extra Movement Speed and 20% Damage Reduction against attacks from the front for 3s.
skill.tips: Allows him to move quite freely on the battlefield. Use this skill wisely, and Aulus will poke, burst, and flee with ease.

Aulus' primary damage source. Use this skill to hit as many enemies as possible, and it will provide a huge attack speed bonus and regen. In this way, Aulus' output and survivability are both greatly increased.

skill.name: The Power of Axe
skill.des: Aulus brandishes his axe, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area, and enhancing up to 6 of his next Basic Attacks for 3s according to the enemies hit (3 per Hero or Creep, 1 per Minion). Enhanced Basic Attacks gain 200% extra Attack Speed and restore 25<font color='#D58E1F'>( +30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#47BE34'>(HP)</font> to Aulus.
skill.tips: Aulus' Ultimate is a knockout blow in teamfights. It can control and hit enemies in a wide range if it's cast at the right angle.

skill.name: Fighting Spirit
skill.des:
Aulus adds a stack of <font color='#404495'>(Fighting Spirit)</font> to his axe per second for 3s after dealing damage to any enemy (up to 4 stacks). Each stack grants 3-12 extra <font color='#D58E1F'>(Physical Attack)</font> and 1-4 <font color='#D58E1F'>(Physical Penetration)</font> (scales with <font color='#404495'>(Undying Fury)</font> level).
Aulus also gains 10% extra Movement Speed and 27-125 Basic Attack Damage at max <font color='#404495'>(Fighting Spirit)</font> stacks (scales with level).
skill.tips: Aulus' key skill. Focus on the duration of "Fury Spirit" and try to maintain the full stacks.

equip.name: Endless Battle
des: Unique Passive - Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 60% Physical Attack as extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: Berserker's Fury
des: Unique Passive - Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Dominance Ice
des: Unique Passive - Arctic Cold: Reduce the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes to 75% of normal.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

gear.tips: For equipment, we recommend this build to ensure the hero's damage output and durability.

skill.name: Soul Shards
skill.des:
<font color='#404495'>(Passive:)</font> Aamon charges his armor each time he casts a skill or hits an enemy with a skill or enhanced Basic Attack. At 5 charges, Aamon throws 5 shards at the target on his next attack, each shard dealing 50<font color='#27C0C7'>( +15% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>. The shards will then scatter around the target.
<font color='#404495'>(Active:)</font> Aamon throws a shard at a nearby enemy, dealing 175<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>.

skill.name: Slayer Shards
skill.des:
Aamon throws a shard forward, dealing 120<font color='#27C0C7'>( +50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies along the way. The shard will return to Aamon after a short delay and allow him to enter the <font color='#404495'>(Camouflage)</font> state.
If the shard hits a non-minion enemy, it'll slow them by 50% for 2s and return to Aamon immediately.

skill.name: Endless Shards
skill.des:
Aamon throws all shards at a designated enemy and slows them by 30% for 1.5s. After a short delay, the shards will fly to the enemy's location again, each dealing 90<font color='#27C0C7'>( +24% Total Magic Power)</font>-150<font color='#27C0C7'>( +40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>.
The number of shards increases with Aamon's armor charges and the shards on the ground (8-25).
The damage dealt increases with the target's lost HP, to the max when the target's HP is below 30%. The same target takes less damage from subsequent attacks.

skill.name: Invisible Armor
skill.des:
Aamon enters the <font color='#404495'>(Camouflage)</font> state each time he hits an enemy with a skill, during which he cannot be targeted, restores 25<font color='#27C0C7'>( +15% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 3% of his lost HP every 0.6s, and gains 60% extra Movement Speed that rapidly decays over 3s.
Upon leaving the <font color='#404495'>(Camouflage)</font> state, Aamon immediately resets his Basic Attack's cooldown and enhances his Basic Attacks within the next 2.5s. Each enhanced Basic Attack deals 70<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+115% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and reduces Aamon's skill cooldowns by 0.5s. The first enhanced Basic Attack's damage is increased to 120% if Aamon leaves the <font color='#404495'>(Camouflage)</font> state actively.

skill.name: Shadow Strike
skill.des:
Valentina casts <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Strike)</font> in the target direction, dealing 340<font color='#27C0C7'>( +185% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 40% for 1s.
Enemy heroes hit by <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Strike)</font> are marked with a Shadow Sigil for 4s and will be <font color='#C53535'>(terrified)</font> for 1s when hit by <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Strike)</font> again within the duration (a unit can only be terrified once within 4s).
skill.tips: Shadow Strike is Valentina's main damage source as well as her harass tool.

skill.name: Arcane Shade
skill.des:
Valentina dashes in the target direction, firing 3 Shadow Bolts at nearby enemies that deal 125<font color='#27C0C7'>( +30% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> each. Valentina can cast this skill again within 6s (costs Mana).
The cooldown of <font color='#404495'>(Shadow Strike)</font> is reduced by 1s each time a Shadow Bolt hits an enemy.
skill.tips: When each Shadow Bolt hits an enemy hero, it reduces the cooldown of Shadow Strike, granting Valentina extra chances to dish out even more damage. Arcane Shade is mighty handy for both offense and retreating maneuvers!

skill.name: I Am You
skill.des:
Valentina slows the target enemy hero by 70% for 0.5s and gains the ability to cast their <font color='#404495'>(Ultimate)</font>. Casting the enemy's <font color='#404495'>(Ultimate)</font> turns Valentina into the enemy hero's form and allows her to inherit their Basic Attack type for up to 12s. Her regular skills remain unchanged, unless the enemy's <font color='#404495'>(Ultimate)</font> has a <font color='#404495'>(Morph)</font> effect.
The stolen <font color='#404495'>(Ultimate)</font>'s level is determined by that of Valentina's own. She gains <font color='#27C0C7'>( +100% Total Magic Power)</font> extra <font color='#D58E1F'>(Physical Attack)</font> for the duration if the enemy is a Physical Damage hero. This skill has no effect on enemy Valentina.
skill.tips: I Am You is the core of Valentina's skill set, allowing her to copy the enemy hero's form and Ultimate Skill, which essentially gives her unparalleled versatility and unlimited potential.

skill.name: Primal Force
skill.des:
Valentina gains 8-50 extra EXP each time she deals damage to an enemy hero. Cooldown: 2s. 
If the enemy hero's level isn't higher than Valentina's, 30% of the damage dealt is converted into her HP. The EXP scales with Valentina's level.
skill.tips: Primal Force is the secret weapon that ensures Valentina's always in the lead: the mechanism promises her advantages in terms of level and survivability.

des: Unique Passive - Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.

des: Unique Passive - Time: Gains 20 extra Max HP and 4 extra Magic Power every 20s, capped at 15 stacks.

equip.name: Blood Wings
des: Unique Passive - Guard: Gains a shield equal to 200% of Magic Power. The shield will regenerate 30s after being damaged, and grants 40 Movement Speed while it lasts.

gear.tips: We recommend this build to boost Valentina's damage and amplify her Passive effect.

skill.name: Earth Shatter
skill.des:
After a 0.75s delay, Edith controls Phylax to launch an earth-shattering blow in a designated direction, dealing 225<font color='#47BE34'>( +10% Total HP)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit (deals 120% damage to minions) and knocking them airborne for 1s.
This skill won't be interrupted by regular control effects (excluding Suppression).
skill.tips: Earth Shatter has a relatively long cast animation, thus it is recommended to couple it with Edith's teammate's control skill or cast it in a bush to increase the hit rate.

skill.name: Onward
skill.des:
Edith controls Phylax to charge in a designated direction, dealing 90<font color='#47BE34'>( +3% Total HP)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way.
If Phylax hits an enemy hero during this process, it'll stop immediately and throw them over its shoulder, dealing 108<font color='#47BE34'>( +5% Total HP)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: Onward is Edith's core skill. Use it to protect teammates or rip a tear in the enemy formation during the team fight.

skill.name: Primal Wrath
skill.des:
<font color='#404495'>(Passive:)</font> When inside Phylax, Edith can accumulate Wrath according to the damage she receives (calculated before damage reduction).
<font color='#404495'>(Active:)</font> Edith ejects herself forward from Phylax, knocking back nearby enemies. She then takes flight, after which she can perform ranged Basic Attacks, each dealing 35<font color='#D58E1F'>( +75% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>. Edith also gains new skills in this state. When in flight, Edith gains 350<font color='#47BE34'>( +5% Total HP)</font>-350<font color='#47BE34'>( +20% Total HP)</font> extra Shield, 50%-150% extra Attack Speed and 10%-30% Spell Vamp based on the Wrath she accumulated, and converts each point of <font color='#47BE34'>(Extra Physical Defense)</font> and <font color='#47BE34'>(Extra Magic Defense)</font> into 3.2 <font color='#27C0C7'>(Magic Power)</font>. The flight state lasts up to 8s.

skill.name: Overload
skill.des:
After each skill cast, Edith and Phylax become Overloaded for 3s, during which all Basic Attacks will trigger chain lightning, dealing extra <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> equal to <font color='#27C0C7'>( +30% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 4% of the target's Max HP to up to 4 enemies.
Chain lightning damage against Minions is increased to 300%.
skill.tips: Edith has the potential to overwhelm her enemy in the early to mid game. With her Passive Overload, she can clear the lanes and suppress her enemy with ease from afar while quickly leveling up to Lv.4.

item.tips: Onward,Earth Shatter,Primal Wrath

skill.name: Sprout
skill.des:
Floryn casts a blob of energy in the target direction, dealing 175<font color='#27C0C7'>( +90% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to the first enemy hit. Upon hitting an enemy or reaching the maximum range, the energy explodes, dealing 105<font color='#27C0C7'>( +54% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and stunning them for 1s (and revealing their positions briefly).
<font color='#404495'>(Evolved Lantern)</font>: The explosion radius is increased to 125%.
skill.tips: Floryn's primary healing skill. It restores HP for multiple targets.

skill.name: Sow
skill.des:
Floryn tosses an Energy Seed at the target enemy, dealing them 180<font color='#27C0C7'>( +180% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>. Healing Fruits will then spawn and bounce to nearby allied heroes, healing them by 175<font color='#27C0C7'>( +65% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 5% of their lost HP (60% of the amount when the skill is cast on a non-hero enemy).
<font color='#404495'>(Evolved Lantern)</font>: The attack range is increased to 125%.
skill.tips: Floryn's primary damage and control skill. Use it to poke and control enemies.

skill.name: Bloom
skill.des:
Floryn resonates with Dew's power, restoring 400<font color='#27C0C7'>( +70% Total Magic Power)</font> HP for all allied heroes 2 times regardless of distance. Enemies around the allied heroes are dealt 150<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and slowed by 30% for 0.8s each time the healing takes effect.
<font color='#404495'>(Evolved Lantern)</font>: The healing removes Healing Reduction effects on allied heroes and makes them immune to the effects for 3s.
skill.tips: Use this skill to heal all your allies without distance limitation and turn the tide!

skill.name: Dew
skill.des:
Dew's <font color='#404495'>(Lantern)</font> can slightly increase Floryn's attributes. The skill is charged with enemy hits and will evolve at full energy stacks (1000).
When at the Base, Floryn can share the <font color='#404495'>(Flower of Hope)</font> with an allied hero, granting them a shield that can absorb 200<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> damage each time they are healed by Floryn's skill or ultimate. Cooldown: 30s. The equipment will also evolve at full energy stacks, increasing the shield value by 25% and slightly increasing the allied hero's Movement Speed.
Floryn will never sell the <font color='#404495'>(Lantern)</font>.
skill.tips: Try to hit enemies with Floryn's skills to stack up her Passive to maximize the power of Lantern.

equip.name: Necklace of Durance
des: Unique Passive - Gift: Regenerates 20% Max HP and Mana over 2s after leveling up.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

gear.tips: For equipment, we recommend this build to ensure Floryn's healing ability and durability.

skill.name: Charged Punch
skill.des:
Yin gains 60% extra Movement Speed (decays over 3s).
Yin can launch an enhanced Basic Attack that deals 25<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> within the duration. Upon hitting an enemy with the enhanced Basic Attack, Yin will throw another charged punch forward, dealing 360<font color='#D58E1F'>( +200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies in the path.
Successfully throwing the charged punch reduces the skill's cooldown by 35%.

skill.name: Instant Blast
skill.des:
Yin dashes forward, leaving a <font color='#404495'>(Golden Ring)</font> behind while dealing 75<font color='#D58E1F'>( +35% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies along the way. He gains 30% extra Damage Reduction for 4s if an enemy hero is hit.
After 1s, the <font color='#404495'>(Golden Ring)</font> will catch up with Yin, dealing 150<font color='#D58E1F'>( +70% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies it passes through and stunning them for 1s.

skill.name: My Turn
skill.des:
After a short delay, Yin locks onto an enemy hero (<font color='#404495'>(cannot lock onto pets or clones)</font>) and pulls them into his domain for up to 8s and turns into <font color='#404495'>(Lieh)</font>. When in the domain, the two cannot be affected by other heroes' skills.
<font color='#404495'>(Lieh)</font> has stronger skills and 50 extra <font color='#47BE34'>(Physical & Magic Defense)</font> that lasts 8s.
The domain will end early if either of the two is killed. If <font color='#404495'>(Lieh)</font> successfully kills the enemy, he'll recover 20% Max HP, leave the domain with the cooldowns of <font color='#404495'>(Frenzy Strike)</font> and <font color='#404495'>(Instant Blast)</font> reset, and continue to fight as <font color='#404495'>(Lieh)</font> for 8s.
If Yin fails to pull his target into his domain, the skill will enter a 3s cooldown.

skill.name: Leave It to Me
skill.des: If there are no allied heroes within 4 units of Yin, his damage is increased to 120% and he gains 8% Spell Vamp.

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: War Axe
des: Unique Passive - Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 10 extra Physical Attack and 2 extra Physical Penetration for 3s, capped at 8 stacks (the effect is reduced to 3 extra Physical Attack and 1 extra Physical Penetration for Marksmen/Mages/Supports). Gains 15% extra Movement Speed at full stacks.

equip.name: Blade of Despair
des: Unique Passive - Despair: Attacking enemies below 50% HP grants 25% extra Physical Attack for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Immortality
des: Unique Passive - Immortal: Revives 2.5s after death, gaining 16% Max HP and a 220-1200 shield (scales with level) that lasts 3s (210s cooldown).

skill.name: Falling!
skill.des:
"Watch me slide forward and increase my Attack Speed for 3 seconds— Ah, that was just boring…"
"<font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font>, go that way!"
"<font color='#404495'>(Cuddles)</font>, come here!"
(The skill's cooldown is reduced by 1.5s each time Melissa damages the enemy by attacking <font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font>.)

skill.name: Eyes on You!
skill.des:
"The plan's like this: Throw <font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font> out to hold down the bad guys, and then… I come on stage!"
"I puncture the bad guys, while <font color='#404495'>(Giggles)</font> hit <font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font> to punish them as well! Hee, fantastic!"
(<font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font> deals 250<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> on the first hit and links nearby enemies for up to 6s. Linked enemies are slowed by 60% that decays over 1.5s and can break the link by moving out of the range. <font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font> will return to Melissa early when there are no enemies around and immediately if she's too far away. When <font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font> is present, you can tap the <font color='#404495'>(Attack Minion)</font> button to directly attack <font color='#404495'>(Muddles)</font>, though it cannot trigger the multi-hit damage.)

skill.name: Go Away!
skill.des:
"<font color='#404495'>(Cuddles)</font>, protect me! For 4 seconds, let no bad guys come close. Unless I say otherwise!"
(When activated, the field knocks back enemies in the area and deals them 500<font color='#27C0C7'>( +100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>. It'll then continuously knock back enemies who attempt to enter the field, dealing them 50<font color='#27C0C7'>( +10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and briefly slowing them. The field will also interrupt the enemy's movement skills unless they're immune to control effects. The field will move with Melissa once, when she's about to move out of the boundary.
<font color='#404495'>(Passive)</font>: Melissa's Physical & Magic Defense is increased by 3. This effect is increased to 5 times when the skill is active.)

skill.name: Doll Buster
skill.des:
"My tailor shop excels at fixing and 'fixing' dolls. Am I right, Muddles?"
(Melissa deals 125% damage to minions, creeps, and summoned units.)

equip.name: Scarlet Phantom
des: Unique Passive - Frenzy: Critical strikes grant 30% extra Attack Speed and 5% extra Crit Chance for 2s.

equip.name: Demon Hunter Sword
des: Unique Passive - Devour: Basic Attacks deal 9% of the target's current HP as extra Physical Damage (capped at 60 against minions).

equip.name: Berserker's Fury
des: Unique Passive - Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.

equip.name: Immortality

equip.name: Malefic Roar
des: Unique Passive - Armor Buster: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.05% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 20%.

skill.name: Infinite Extension
skill.des:
Xavier fires a Mystic Bullet that deals 350<font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies it passes through.
The Bullet's flying distance increases each time it hits an enemy or the <font color='#404495'>(Mystic Barrier)</font> (up to 5 times).

skill.name: Mystic Field
skill.des:
Xavier conjures a <font color='#404495'>(Mystic Barrier)</font> that lasts 5s. Enemies that come into contact with the Barrier will take 125<font color='#27C0C7'>( +60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and be slowed by 50%, while allies will gain 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s.
When hit by Xavier's other skills, the Barrier will expand into a forbidden field for 3s, dealing 300<font color='#27C0C7'>( +120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies within and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

skill.name: Dawning Light
skill.des:
Xavier unleashes a beam of Mystic magic in the target direction, dealing 650<font color='#27C0C7'>( +150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to all enemies in a line on the map.
He also directly enters the <font color='#404495'>(Transcendence)</font> state and resets the state's duration.

skill.name: Transcendence
skill.des:
Xavier enhances his subsequent skills each time his skill hits an enemy hero. <font color='#404495'>(Stage I:)</font> Increases Movement Speed by 50% when subsequent skills hit, decaying over 1.2s. <font color='#404495'>(Stage II:)</font> Width of subsequent skills will be greatly increased. <font color='#404495'>(Stage III:)</font> Skill Cooldown reduced by 4s (12s for the Ultimate). At <font color='#404495'>(Stage III)</font>, Xavier enters the <font color='#404495'>(Transcendence)</font> state.
<font color='#404495'>(Transcendence:)</font> All of Xavier's skills are enhanced to <font color='#404495'>(Stage III)</font> state for 5s (this duration is extended by 1s each time Xavier's skill hits an enemy).

equip.name: Enchanted Talisman
des: Unique Passive - Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.

equip.name: Glowing Wand
des: Unique Passive - Scorch: Magic Damage will burn targets for 3s, dealing Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of the target's Max HP per second, and increasing their Magic Damage taken by 2-4 (scales with level). Stacks up to 6 times.

equip.name: Fleeting Time
des: Unique Passive - Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

equip.name: Holy Crystal
des: Unique Passive - Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

equip.name: Divine Glaive
des: Unique Passive - Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

skill.name: Scythe
skill.des:
Julian hurls a flying scythe in the target direction, dealing 380<font color='#27C0C7'>( +140% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 1s.
The scythe disappears upon hitting a non-minion enemy.

skill.name: Sword
skill.des: Julian summons a flying sword and dashes in the target direction, dealing 400<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies along the way.

skill.name: Chain
skill.des: Julian casts chains at the target location, dealing 300<font color='#27C0C7'>( +100% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies hit after a short delay and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

skill.name: Smith's Legacy
skill.des:
After casting two different skills, Julian enhances his third skill. Casting the enhanced skill makes all his skills go on a 10-6.5s Cooldown (decreases with his level), but his Basic Attacks within the next 5s will deal 75<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#27C0C7'>(+120% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> and pull the target toward him.
Julian gains 15% extra Magic Lifesteal for 5s each time he hits an enemy hero with his skills (up to 3 stacks).

equip.name: Clock of Destiny
des: Unique Passive - Time: Gains 20 extra Max HP and 4 extra Magic Power every 20s, capped at 15 stacks.

des: Unique Passive - Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3-7 (scales with level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equip.name: Brute Force Breastplate
des: Unique Passive - Brute Force: Casting skills and Basic Attacks grants 2% Movement Speed and 4 Physical and Magic Defense for 4s, capped at 5 stacks.

equip.name: Calamity Reaper
des: Unique Passive - Calamity: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 120% Magic Power as extra True Damage and grants 10% extra Movement Speed (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

skill.name: Piercing Strike
skill.des:
Fredrinn thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing 125<font color='#47BE34'>( +7% Total HP)</font> <font color='#D58E1F'>(+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s. His next Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals 85<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font>.
This skill deals 150% damage to non-hero enemies.
skill.tips: Use this skill to deal damage and clear lanes, while gaining combo points!

skill.name: Brave Assault
skill.des: Fredrinn dashes in the target direction, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to the first non-minion enemy hit. His next Basic Attack knocks the target airborne for 0.3s.
skill.tips: Use this skill to approach enemies or start combos. Cast it followed by enhanced Basic Attacks to control enemies.

skill.name: Energy Eruption
skill.des:
Fredrinn deals 300<font color='#D58E1F'>( +100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and taunts them for 1s. Hitting a non-minion enemy grants Fredrinn 30 Physical and Magic Defense for 3s and reduces the cooldowns of <font color='#404495'>(Piercing Strike)</font> and <font color='#404495'>(Brave Assault)</font> by 75%.
This skill costs 1 <font color='#404495'>(Combo Point)</font>.
skill.tips: As the primary damage source, this skill can deal massive damage to enemies in teamfights.

skill.name: Crystalline Armor
skill.des:
Fredrinn gains 1 <font color='#404495'>(Combo Point)</font> that lasts 5s each time his skill hits a non-minion enemy, up to 4 <font color='#404495'>(Combo Points)</font>. His Ultimate costs different numbers of <font color='#404495'>(Combo Points)</font> at different skill levels.
Fredrinn stores 100% of the damage he receives as <font color='#404495'>(Crystal Energy)</font>, which decays after 5s at a rate of 10% Max HP per second.
Fredrinn can convert the stored <font color='#404495'>(Crystal Energy)</font> into HP by 25% of his damage dealt (15% for damage dealt to minions). Gaining a <font color='#404495'>(Combo Point)</font> resets the decaying timer.
skill.tips: He can also restore HP by his damage dealt.

equip.name: Warrior Boots
des: Unique Passive - Valor: Gains 5 extra Physical Defense for 3s when struck by a Basic Attack, capped at 25.

equip.name: Cursed Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Burning Soul: Deals Magic Damage equal to 0.8% of the hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 210% to 350% against creeps and minions (scales with level).

equip.name: Thunder Belt
des: Unique Passive - Thunderbolt: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals 50 plus 5% of the hero's extra HP as extra True Damage to the target and enemies around them and slows them by 40%-80% (scales with the hero's extra HP) for 1s (1.5s cooldown).

equip.name: Oracle
des: Unique Passive - Bless: Received Shield and HP Regen effects are increased by 30%.

equip.name: Guardian Helmet
des: Unique Passive - Recovery: Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

gear.tips: For equipment, we recommend this build as it enhances Fredrinn's defense and helps restore HP.

skill.name: Look, Leonin Crystal!
skill.des: Joy summons a <font color='#404495'>(Leonin Crystal)</font> at the target location, dealing 200<font color='#27C0C7'>( +40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 1s. The <font color='#404495'>(Leonin Crystal)</font> lasts up to s.
skill.tips: Use this skill in tandem with the Second Skill, or to harass enemies and activate the Passive.

skill.name: Meow, Rhythm of Joy!
skill.des: Joy dashes in the target direction, dealing 120<font color='#27C0C7'>( +55% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> to enemies in her path. Hitting an enemy or the <font color='#404495'>(Leonin Crystal)</font> allows Joy to enter <font color='#404495'>(Beat Time!)</font> for 1s, during which she becomes immune to control effects, gains 30% Movement Speed, and can cast this skill again up to 4 times. Casting this skill on the beat increases the skill damage by 100%.
skill.tips: This skill is Joy's main damage source. Casting this skill on the beat unlocks the Ultimate.

skill.name: Ha, Electrifying Beats!
skill.des:
Joy increases Physical and Magic Defense by 15<font color='#27C0C7'>( +10% Total Magic Power)</font> and removes all debuffs on her while gaining 100% Movement Speed that decays over time and Slow Immunity. Over the next 3s, she deals 180<font color='#27C0C7'>( +55% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font> 6 times to nearby enemies. Enemies hit by this skill multiple times take 20% less damage each time (down to 40%).
Each <font color='#404495'>(Meow, Rhythm of Joy!)</font> cast on the beat increases this skill's damage by 33%. Achieving perfect rhythm on every <font color='#404495'>(Meow, Rhythm of Joy!)</font> cast increases Joy's Spell Vamp by 30% while this skill is active.
This skill unlocks after Joy casts <font color='#404495'>(Meow, Rhythm of Joy!)</font> <Num10> times in succession.
skill.tips: Use this ultimate damage skill to deal massive damage and finish off enemies.

skill.name: Humph, Joy's Angry!
skill.des:
Joy becomes <font color='#404495'>(Angry!)</font> each time her skill hits a non-Minion enemy, dealing 200<font color='#27C0C7'>( +80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>. This effect has a cooldown of 6s for each target.
Joy's Basic Attack will deal 65<font color='#D58E1F'>( +25% Total Physical Attack)</font>  <font color='#27C0C7'>(+65% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color='#3B69FF'>(Magic Damage)</font>.
skill.tips: This Passive skill grants you more agility and protection!

skill.name: Dauntless Strike
skill.des: Arlott swings his lance forward, dealing 200<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> and briefly stunning targets in an area. Targets hit by the further part of the AOE will be stunned for 1s instead.

skill.name: Vengeance
skill.des:
Arlott charges at an enemy, dealing 160<font color='#D58E1F'>( +60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> (this skill cannot be interrupted during movement).
If Arlott's target is <font color='#404495'>(Marked)</font>, this skill will deal double damage,  immediately refresh its cooldown, and restore <font color='#47BE34'>( +7% Total HP)</font> HP to Arlott (only restores 50% of that amount when used on a non-hero unit.)

skill.name: Final Slash
skill.des: Arlott cleaves in front of him, dealing 400<font color='#D58E1F'>( +80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color='#C53535'>(Physical Damage)</font> to targets in the area while pushing them to the end of the AOE and briefly revealing their location.

skill.name: Demon Gaze
skill.des:
Arlott possesses a demonic eye that will <font color='#404495'>(Mark)</font> enemy units near Arlott that become affected by control effects for 8s.
The eye will also automatically <font color='#404495'>(Mark)</font> a nearby enemy hero in vision every 8s.
